myriel 1815 m charl françoi bienvenu myriel wa bishop d he wa old man seventi five year age he had occupi see d 1806 although thi detail ha no connect whatev real substanc what we are relat it will not be superflu if mere sake exact all point mention here variou rumor remark which had been circul him veri moment when he arriv dioces true or fals that which is said men often occupi as import place their live all their destini as that which they do m myriel wa son councillor parliament aix henc he belong nobil bar it wa said that hi father destin him be heir hi own post had marri him veri earli age eighteen or twenti accord custom which is rather wide preval parliamentari famili spite thi marriag howev it wa said that charl myriel creat great deal talk he wa well form though rather short statur eleg grace intellig whole first portion hi life had been devot world gallantri revolut came event succeed each other precipit parliamentari famili decim pursu hunt down were dispers m charl myriel emigr itali veri begin revolut there hi wife die maladi chest which she had long suffer he had no children what took place next fate m myriel ruin french societi olden day fall hi own famili tragic spectacl 93 which were perhap even more alarm emigr who view them distanc magnifi power terror did these caus idea renunci solitud germin him wa he midst these distract these affect which absorb hi life suddenli smitten one those mysteri terribl blow which sometim overwhelm strike hi heart man whom public catastroph would not shake strike hi exist hi fortun no one could have told all that wa known wa that when he return itali he wa priest 1804 m myriel wa curé b brignol he wa alreadi advanc year live veri retir manner epoch coron some petti affair connect hi curaci just what is not precis known took him pari other power person whom he went solicit aid hi parishion wa m le cardin fesch one day when emperor had come visit hi uncl worthi curé who wa wait anteroom found himself present when hi majesti pass napoleon find himself observ certain curios thi old man turn round said abruptli who is thi good man who is stare me sire said m myriel you are look good man i great man each us can profit it that veri even emperor ask cardin name curé some time afterward m myriel wa utterli astonish learn that he had been appoint bishop d what truth wa there all stori which were invent as earli portion m myriel s life no one knew veri few famili had been acquaint myriel famili revolut m myriel had undergo fate everi newcom littl town where there are mani mouth which talk veri few head which think he wa oblig undergo it although he wa bishop becaus he wa bishop but all rumor which hi name wa connect were rumor onli nois say word less than word _palabres_ as energet languag south express it howev that may be nine year episcop power resid d all stori subject convers which engross petti town petti peopl outset had fallen profound oblivion no one would have dare mention them no one would have dare recal them m myriel had arriv d accompani elderli spinster mademoisel baptistin who wa hi sister ten year hi junior their onli domest wa femal servant same age as mademoisel baptistin name madam magloir who have been _the servant m le curé_ now assum doubl titl maid mademoisel housekeep monseigneur mademoisel baptistin wa long pale thin gentl creatur she realiz ideal express word respect it seem that woman must need be mother order be vener she had never been pretti her whole life which had been noth but success holi deed had final confer her sort pallor transpar as she advanc year she had acquir what may be call beauti good what had been lean her youth had becom transpar her matur thi diaphan allow angel be seen she wa soul rather than virgin her person seem made shadow there wa hardli suffici bodi provid sex littl matter enclos light larg eye forev droop mere pretext soul s remain earth madam magloir wa littl fat white old woman corpul bustl be so good as come hi hous monsieur director hospit said he him how mani sick peopl have you present moment twenti six monseigneur that wa number which i count said bishop bed pursu director are veri much crowd against each other that is what i observ hall are noth but room it is difficulti that air can be chang them so it seem me then when there is ray sun garden is veri small convalesc that wa what i said myself case epidem we have had typhu fever thi year we had sweat sick two year ago hundr patient time we know not what do that is thought which occur me what would you have monseigneur said director one must resign one s self thi convers took place galleri dine room ground floor bishop remain silent moment then he turn abruptli director hospit monsieur said he how mani bed do you himself then rais hi voic hold monsieur director hospit i will tell you someth there is evid mistak here there are thirti six you five or six small room there are three us here we have room sixti phrase mani imag which characterist form real eloqu jesu christ be convinc himself he wa persuas chapter iv work correspond word hi convers wa gay affabl he put himself level two old women who had pass their live besid him when he laugh it wa laugh schoolboy madam magloir like call him your grace _votr grandeur_ one day he rose hi armchair went hi librari search book thi book wa one upper shelv thought than usual while madam de lô wa relat onc again detail all these inherit all these expect she interrupt herself impati mon dieu cousin what are you think i am think repli bishop singular remark which is be found i believ st augustin place your hope man whom you do not inherit anoth time receiv notif deceas gentleman countri side wherein not onli digniti dead man but also feudal nobl qualif all hi rel spread entir page what stout back death ha he exclaim what strang burden titl is cheer impos him how much wit must men have order thu press tomb servic vaniti he wa gift occas gentl railleri which almost alway conceal seriou mean cours one lent youth vicar came d preach cathedr he wa toler eloqu subject hi sermon wa chariti he urg rich give poor order avoid hell which he depict most fright manner which he wa capabl win paradis which he repres as charm desir audienc there wa wealthi retir merchant who wa somewhat usur name m géborand who had amass two million manufactur coars cloth serg woollen galloon never hi whole life had m géborand bestow alm ani poor wretch deliveri that sermon it wa observ that he gave sou everi sunday poor old beggar women door cathedr there were six them share it one day bishop caught sight him act bestow thi chariti said hi sister smile there is m géborand purchas paradis sou when it wa question chariti he wa not be rebuf even refus such occas he gave utter remark which induc reflect onc he wa beg poor draw room town there wa present marqui de champterci wealthi avarici old man who contriv be one same time ultra royalist ultra voltairian thi varieti man ha actual exist when bishop came him he touch hi arm _ you must give me someth m le marqui _ marqui turn round answer dryli _ i have poor peopl my own monseigneur give them me _ repli bishop one day he preach follow sermon cathedr my veri dear brethren my good friend there are thirteen hundr twenti thousand peasant dwell franc which have but three open eighteen hundr seventeen thousand hovel which have but two open door one window three hundr forti six thousand cabin besid which have but one open door thi aris thing which is call tax door window just put poor famili old women littl children those build behold fever maladi which result ala god give air men law sell it them i do not blame law but i bless god depart isèr var two depart alp haut bass peasant have not even wheelbarrow they transport their manur back men they have no candl they burn resin stick bit rope dip pitch that is state affair whole hilli countri dauphiné they make bread six month one time they bake it dri cow dung winter they break thi bread axe they soak it twenti four hour order render it eatabl my brethren have piti behold suffer all side you born provenç he easili familiar himself dialect south he said _ en bé moussu sé sagé _ as lower languedoc _ onté anara passa _ as bass alp _ puert un bouen moutu emb un bouen fromag grase _ as upper dauphiné thi pleas peopl extrem contribut not littl win him access all spirit he wa perfectli home thatch cottag mountain he understood how say grandest thing most vulgar idiom as he spoke all tongu he enter all heart moreov he wa same peopl world lower class he condemn noth hast take circumst account he said examin road which fault ha pass be as he describ himself smile _ex sinner_ he had none asper auster he profess good deal distinct frown feroci virtuou doctrin which may be sum as follow man ha him hi flesh which is onc hi burden hi temptat he drag it him yield it he must watch it check it repress it obey it onli last extrem there may be some fault even thi obedi but fault thu commit is venial it is fall but fall knee which may termin prayer be saint is except be upright man is rule err fall sin if you will but be upright least possibl sin is law man no sin all is dream angel all which is terrestri is subject sin sin is gravit when he saw everyon exclaim veri loudli grow angri veri quickli oh oh he said smile all appear thi is great crime which all world commit these are hypocrisi which have taken fright are hast make protest put themselv shelter he wa indulg women poor peopl whom burden human societi rest he said fault women children feebl indig ignor are fault husband father master strong rich wise he said moreov teach those who are ignor as mani thing as possibl societi is culpabl that it doe not afford instruct grati it is respons night which it produc thi soul is full shadow sin is therein commit guilti one is not person who ha commit sin but person who ha creat shadow it will be perceiv that he had peculiar manner hi own judg thing i suspect that he obtain it gospel one day he heard crimin case which wa prepar point trial discuss draw room wretch man be end hi resourc had coin counterfeit money love woman child which he had had her counterfeit wa still punish death that epoch woman had been arrest act pass first fals piec made man she wa held but there were no proof against her she alon could accus her lover destroy him her confess she deni they insist she persist her denial thereupon idea occur attorney crown he invent infidel part lover succeed mean fragment letter cunningli present persuad unfortun woman that she had rival that man wa deceiv her thereupon exasper jealousi she denounc her lover confess all prove all man wa ruin he wa shortli be tri aix hi accomplic they were relat matter each one wa express enthusiasm clever magistr bring jealousi play he had caus truth burst forth wrath he had educ justic reveng bishop listen all thi silenc when they had finish he inquir where are thi man woman be tri court assiz he went where will advoc crown be tri tragic event occur d man wa condemn death murder he wa wretch fellow not exactli educ not exactli ignor who had been mountebank fair writer public town took great interest trial eve day fix execut condemn man chaplain prison fell ill priest wa need attend crimin hi last moment they sent curé it seem that he refus come say that is no affair mine i have noth do that unpleas task that mountebank i too am ill besid it is not my place thi repli wa report bishop who said _ monsieur le curé is right it is not hi place it is mine _ he went instantli prison descend cell mountebank call him name took him hand spoke him he pass entir day him forget food sleep pray god soul condemn man pray condemn man hi own he told him best truth which are also most simpl he wa father brother friend he wa bishop onli bless he taught him everyth encourag consol him man wa point die despair death wa abyss him as he stood trembl it mourn brink he recoil horror he wa not suffici ignor be absolut indiffer hi condemn which had been profound shock had manner broken here there that wall which separ us mysteri thing which we call life he gaze incessantli thi world these fatal breach beheld onli dark bishop made him see light follow day when they came fetch unhappi wretch bishop wa still there he follow him exhibit himself eye crowd hi purpl camail hi episcop cross hi neck side side crimin bound cord he mount tumbril him he mount scaffold him suffer who had been so gloomi cast down preced day wa radiant he felt that hi soul wa reconcil he hope god bishop embrac him moment when knife wa fall he said him god rais dead him whom man slay he whom hi brother have reject find hi father onc more pray believ enter life father is there when he descend scaffold there wa someth hi look which made peopl draw asid let him pass they did not know which wa most worthi admir hi pallor or hi seren hi return humbl dwell which he design smile as _hi palace_ he said hi sister _ i have just offici pontif _ most sublim thing are often those which are least understood there were peopl town who said when comment thi conduct bishop _ it is affect _ thi howev wa remark which wa confin draw room populac which perceiv no jest holi deed wa touch admir him as bishop it wa shock him have beheld guillotin it wa long time he recov it fact when scaffold is there all erect prepar it ha someth it which produc hallucin one may feel certain indiffer death penalti one may refrain pronounc it say ye or no so long as one ha not seen guillotin one s own eye but if one encount one them shock is violent one is forc decid take part or against some admir it like de maistr other execr it like beccaria guillotin is concret law it is call _vindicate_ it is not neutral it doe not permit you remain neutral he who see it shiver most mysteri shiver all social problem erect their interrog point around thi chop knife scaffold is vision scaffold is not piec carpentri scaffold is not machin scaffold is not inert bit mechan construct wood iron cord it seem as though it were be possess i know not what sombr initi one would say that thi piec carpent s work saw that thi machin heard that thi mechan understood that thi wood thi iron these cord were possess will fright medit which it presenc cast soul scaffold appear terribl guis as though take part what is go scaffold is accomplic execution it devour it eat flesh it drink blood scaffold is sort monster fabric judg carpent spectr which seem live horribl vital compos all death which it ha inflict therefor impress wa terribl profound day follow execut mani succeed day bishop appear be crush almost violent seren funer moment had disappear phantom social justic torment him he who gener return all hi deed radiant satisfact seem be reproach himself time he talk himself stammer lugubri monologu low voic thi is one which hi sister overheard one even preserv i did not think that it wa so monstrou it is wrong becom absorb divin law such degre as not perceiv human law death belong god alon what right do men touch that unknown thing cours time these impress weaken probabl vanish nevertheless it wa observ that bishop thenceforth avoid pass place execut m myriel could be summon ani hour bedsid sick die he did not ignor fact that therein lay hi greatest duti hi greatest labor widow orphan famili had no need summon him he came hi own accord he understood how sit down hold hi peac long hour besid man who had lost wife hi love mother who had lost her child as he knew moment silenc he knew also moment speech oh admir consol he sought not effac sorrow forget but magnifi dignifi it hope he said have care manner which you turn dead think not that which perish gaze steadili you will perceiv live light your well belov dead depth heaven he knew that faith is wholesom he sought counsel calm despair man point him resign man transform grief which gaze grave show him grief which fix it gaze star chapter v monseigneur bienvenu made hi cassock last too long privat life m myriel wa fill same thought as hi public life voluntari poverti which bishop d live would have been solemn charm sight ani one who could have view it close hand like all old men like major thinker he slept littl thi brief slumber wa profound morn he medit hour then he said hi mass either cathedr or hi own hous hi mass said he broke hi fast rye bread dip milk hi own cow then he set work bishop is veri busi man he must everi day receiv secretari bishopr who is gener canon nearli everi day hi vicar gener he ha congreg reprov privileg grant whole ecclesiast librari examin prayer book diocesan catech book hour etc charg write sermon author curé mayor reconcil cleric correspond administr correspond one side state other holi see thousand matter busi what time wa left him these thousand detail busi hi offic hi breviari he bestow first necessit sick afflict time which wa left him afflict sick necessit he devot work sometim he dug hi garden again he read or wrote he had but one word both these kind toil he call them _gardening_ mind is garden said he midday when weather wa fine he went forth took stroll countri or town often enter lowli dwell he wa seen walk alon buri hi own thought hi eye cast down support himself hi long cane clad hi wad purpl garment silk which wa veri warm wear purpl stock insid hi coars shoe surmount flat hat which allow three golden tassel larg bullion droop it three point it wa perfect festiv wherev he appear one would have said that hi presenc had someth warm lumin it children old peopl came doorstep bishop as sun he bestow hi bless they bless him they point hi hous ani one who wa need anyth illustr comfort here there he halt accost littl boy girl smile mother he visit poor so long as he had ani money when he no longer had ani he visit rich as he made hi cassock last long while did not wish have it notic he never went town hi wad purpl cloak thi inconvenienc him somewhat summer hi return he dine dinner resembl hi breakfast half past eight even he sup hi sister madam magloir stand behind them serv them tabl noth could be more frugal than thi repast if howev bishop had one hi curé supper madam magloir took advantag opportun serv monseigneur some excel fish lake or some fine game mountain everi curé furnish pretext good meal bishop did not interfer that except hi ordinari diet consist onli veget boil water oil soup thu it wa said town _when bishop doe not indulg cheer curé he indulg cheer trappist_ supper he convers half hour mademoisel baptistin madam magloir then he retir hi own room set write sometim loos sheet again margin some folio he wa man letter rather learn he left behind him wind wa precipit earth _ final chaldaic paraphras onkelo which render it _a wind come god blew face waters_ anoth dissert he examin theolog work hugo bishop ptolemaï great grand uncl writer thi book _correspond lord germain gener clinton cornwal admir american station versail poinçot book seller pari pissot booksel quai de augustin _ here is note oh you who are ecclesiast call you all power beauti altar he said is soul unhappi creatur consol thank god hi oratori there were two straw prie dieu there wa armchair also straw hi bedroom when chanc he receiv seven or eight person one time turn everyth account have nevertheless one useless plot it would be better grow salad there than bouquet madam magloir retort bishop you are mistaken beauti is as use as use he ad paus more so perhap thi plot consist three or four bed occupi bishop almost as much as did hi book he like pass hour or two there trim hoe make hole here there earth which he drop seed he wa not as hostil insect as garden could have wish see him moreov he made no pretens botani he ignor group consist he made not slightest effort decid tournefort natur method he took part neither bud against cotyledon nor jussieu against linnæu he did not studi plant he love flower he respect learn men greatli he respect ignor still more ever fail these two respect he water hi flower bed everi summer even tin water pot paint green hous had not singl door which could be lock door dine room which as we have said open directli cathedr squar had formerli been ornament lock bolt like door prison bishop had had all thi ironwork remov thi door wa never fasten either night or day anyth latch all that first passer had do ani hour wa give it push first two women had been veri much tri thi door which wa never fasten but monsieur de d had said them have bolt put your room if that will pleas you they had end share hi confid or least act as though they share it madam magloir alon had fright time time as bishop hi thought can be found explain or least indic three line which he wrote margin bibl thi is shade differ door physician should never be shut door priest should alway be open anoth book entitl _philosophi medic science_ he had written thi other note am not i physician like them i also have my patient then too i have some whom i call my unfortun again he wrote do not inquir name him who ask shelter you veri man who is embarrass hi name is one who need shelter it chanc that worthi curé i know not it wa curé couloubroux or curé pompierri took it hi head ask him one day probabl instig madam magloir monsieur wa sure that he wa not commit indiscret certain extent leav hi door unfasten day night merci ani one who should choos enter short he did not fear lest some misfortun might occur hous so littl guard bishop touch hi shoulder gentl graviti said him _ nisi dominu custodierit domum vanum vigil qui custodiunt eam unless lord guard hous vain do they watch who guard it _ then he spoke someth els he wa fond say there is braveri priest as well as braveri colonel dragoon onli he ad our must be tranquil chapter vii cravatt it is here that fact fall natur place which we must not omit becaus it is one sort which show us best what sort man bishop d wa destruct band gaspard bè who had infest gorg ollioul one hi lieuten cravatt took refug mountain he conceal himself some time hi bandit remnant gaspard bè s troop counti nice then he made hi way piédmont suddenli reappear franc vicin barcelonett he wa first seen jauzier then tuil he hid himself cavern joug de l aigl thenc he descend hamlet villag ravin ubay ubayett he even push as far as embrun enter cathedr one night despoil sacristi hi highway robberi laid wast countri side gendarm were set hi track but vain he alway escap sometim he resist main forc he wa bold wretch midst all thi terror bishop arriv he wa make hi circuit chastelar mayor came meet him urg him retrac hi step cravatt wa possess mountain as far as arch there wa danger even escort it mere expos three or four unfortun gendarm no purpos therefor said bishop i intend go escort you do not realli mean that monseigneur exclaim mayor i do mean it so thoroughli that i absolut refus ani gendarm shall set hour set set alon alon monseigneur you will not do that there exist yonder mountain said bishop tini commun no bigger than that which i have not seen three year they are my good friend those gentl honest shepherd they own one goat everi thirti that they tend they make veri pretti woollen cord variou color they play mountain air littl flute six hole they need be told good god now then what would they say bishop who wa afraid what would they say if i did not go but brigand monseigneur hold said bishop i must think that you are right i may meet them they too need be told good god but monseigneur there is band them flock wolv monsieur le mair it may be that it is thi veri flock wolv that jesu ha constitut me shepherd who know way provid they will rob you monseigneur i have noth they will kill you old goodman priest who pass mumbl hi prayer bah what purpos oh mon dieu what if you should meet them i should beg alm them my poor do not go monseigneur name heaven you are risk your life monsieur le mair said bishop is that realli all i am not world guard my own life but guard soul they had allow him do as he pleas he set accompani onli child who offer serv as guid hi obstinaci wa bruit countri side caus great constern he would take neither hi sister nor madam magloir he travers mountain mule back encount no one arriv safe sound resid hi good friend shepherd he remain there fortnight preach administ sacrament teach exhort when time hi departur approach he resolv chant _te deum_ pontif he mention it curé but what wa be done there were no episcop ornament they ad smile him who content himself surplic curat god send cope archbishop monseigneur murmur curé throw back hi head smile god or devil bishop look steadili curé repeat author god when he return chastelar peopl came stare him as curios all road priest s hous chastelar he rejoin mademoisel baptistin madam magloir who were wait him he said hi sister well wa i right poor priest went hi poor mountain empti hand he return them hi hand full i set bear onli my faith god i have brought back treasur cathedr that even he went bed he said again let us never fear robber nor murder those are danger petti danger let us fear ourselv prejudic are real robber vice are real murder great danger lie ourselv what matter it what threaten our head or our purs let us think onli that which threaten our soul then turn hi sister sister never precaut part priest against hi fellow man that which hi fellow doe god permit let us confin ourselv prayer when we think that danger is approach us let us pray not ourselv but that our brother may not fall sin our account howev such incid were rare hi life we relat those which we know but gener he pass hi life do same thing same moment one month hi year resembl one hour hi day as what becam treasur cathedr embrun we should be embarrass ani inquiri that direct it consist veri handsom thing veri tempt thing thing which were veri well adapt be stolen benefit unfortun stolen they had alreadi been elsewher half adventur wa complet it onli remain impart new direct theft caus it take short trip direct poor howev we make no assert thi point onli rather obscur note wa found bishop s paper which may bear some relat thi matter which is couch these term _ question is decid thi should be turn cathedr or hospit _ chapter viii philosophi drink senat mention wa clever man who had made hi own way heedless those thing which present obstacl which are call conscienc sworn faith justic duti he had march straight hi goal onc flinch line hi advanc hi interest he wa old attorney soften success not bad man ani mean who render all small servic hi power hi son hi son law hi relat even hi friend have wise seiz life good side good opportun good windfal everyth els seem him veri stupid he wa intellig just suffici educ think himself discipl epicuru while he wa realiti onli product pigault lebrun he laugh willingli pleasantli infinit etern thing crotchet that good old fellow bishop he even sometim laugh him amiabl author presenc m myriel himself who listen him some semi offici occas or other i do not recollect what count thi senat m myriel were dine prefect dessert senat who wa slightli exhilar though still perfectli dignifi exclaim egad bishop let s have discuss it is hard senat bishop look each other wink we are two augur i am go make confess you i have philosophi my own you are right repli bishop as one make one s philosophi so one lie it you are bed purpl senat senat wa encourag went let us be good fellow good devil even said bishop i declar you continu senat that marqui d argen pyrrhon hobb m naigeon are no rascal i have all philosoph my librari gild edg like yourself count interpos bishop senat resum i hate diderot he is ideologist declaim revolutionist believ god bottom more bigot than voltair voltair made sport needham he wa wrong needham s eel prove that god is useless drop vinegar spoon flour past suppli _fiat lux_ suppos drop be larger spoon bigger you have world man is eel then what is good etern father jehovah hypothesi tire me bishop it is good noth but produc shallow peopl whose reason is hollow down that great all which torment me hurrah zero which leav me peac you me order empti my sack make confess my pastor as it behoov me do i will admit you that i have good sens i am not enthusiast your jesu who preach renunci sacrific last extrem ti counsel avarici man beggar renunci whi sacrific what end i do not see one wolf immol himself happi anoth wolf let us stick natur then we are top let us have superior philosophi what is advantag be top if one see no further than end other peopl s nose let us live merrili life is all that man ha anoth futur elsewher high anywher i don t believ not one singl word it ah sacrific renunci are recommend me i must take heed everyth i do i must cudgel my brain good evil just unjust _fas_ _nefas_ whi becaus i shall have render account my action when death what fine dream my death it will be veri clever person who can catch me have hand dust seiz shadow hand if you can let us tell truth we who are initi who have rais veil isi there is no such thing as either good or evil there is veget let us seek real let us get bottom it let us go it thoroughli what deuc let us go bottom it we must scent truth dig earth it seiz it then it give you exquisit joy then you grow strong you laugh i am squar bottom i am immort bishop is chanc wait dead men s shoe ah what charm promis trust it if you like what fine lot adam ha we are soul we shall be angel blue wing our shoulder blade do come my assist is it not tertullian who say that bless shall travel star star veri well we shall be grasshopp star then besid we shall see god ta ta ta what twaddl all these paradis are god is nonsens monster i would not say that _moniteur_ egad but i may whisper it friend _inter pocula_ sacrific world paradis is let slip prey shadow be dupe infinit i m not such fool i am nought i call myself monsieur le comt nought senat did i exist my birth no shall i exist death no what am i littl dust collect organ what am i do thi earth choic rest me suffer or enjoy whither will suffer lead me nothing but i shall have suffer whither will enjoy lead me nothing but i shall have enjoy myself my choic is made one must eat or be eaten i shall eat it is better be tooth than grass such is my wisdom which go whither i push thee grave digger is there pantheon some us all fall great hole end _finis_ total liquid thi is vanish point death is death believ me i laugh idea there be ani one who ha anyth tell me that subject fabl nurs bugaboo children jehovah men no our morrow is night tomb there is noth but equal nothing you have been sardanapalu you have been vincent de paul it make no differ that is truth then live your life all thing make use your _i_ while you have it truth bishop i tell you that i have philosophi my own i have my philosoph i don t let myself be taken that nonsens cours there must be someth those who are down barefoot beggar knife grinder miser wretch legend chimæra soul immort paradis star are provid them swallow they gobbl it down they spread it their dri bread he who ha noth els ha good god that is least he can have i oppos no object that but i reserv monsieur naigeon myself good god is good populac bishop clap hi hand that s talk he exclaim what excel realli marvel thing is thi materi not everi one who want it can have it ah when one doe have it one is no longer dupe one doe not stupidli allow one s self be exil like cato nor stone like stephen nor burn aliv like jeann d arc those who have succeed procur thi admir materi have joy feel themselv irrespons think that they can devour everyth uneasi place sinecur digniti power well or ill acquir lucr recant use treacheri savori capitul conscienc that they shall enter tomb their digest accomplish how agreeabl that is i do not say that refer you senat nevertheless it is imposs me refrain congratul you you great lord have so you say philosophi your own yourselv which is exquisit refin access rich alon good all sauc which season voluptu life admir thi philosophi ha been extract depth unearth special seeker but you are good natur princ you do not think it bad thing that belief good god should constitut philosophi peopl veri much as goos stuf chestnut is truffl turkey poor chapter ix brother as depict sister order furnish idea privat establish bishop d manner which those two saint women subordin their action their thought their feminin instinct even which are easili alarm habit ugli besid i should much prefer round tabl mahogani i am alway veri happi my brother is so good he give all he ha poor sick we are veri much cramp countri is tri winter we realli must do someth those who are need we are almost comfort light warm you see that these are great treat my brother ha way hi own when he talk he say that bishop ought be so just imagin door our hous is never fasten whoever than it did me accustom herself what she term hi imprud but now habit ha been acquir we pray togeth we trembl togeth we fall asleep if devil were enter thi hous he would be allow do so all what is chapter xii solitud monseigneur welcom bishop is almost alway surround full squadron littl abbé just as gener is covey young offic thi is what that charm saint françoi de sale call somewher le prêtre church these are bishop who stand well court who are rich well endow skil accept world who know how pray no doubt but who know also how beg who feel littl scrupl make whole dioces danc attend their person who are connect link sacristi diplomaci who are abbé rather than priest prelat rather than bishop happi those who approach them be person influenc they creat shower them assidu favor all young archbishop archbishop who know how becom cardin carri you him as conclavist you enter court papal jurisdict you receiv pallium behold you are auditor then papal chamberlain then monsignor grace emin how mani blush chorist how mani youth abbé bear their head perrett s pot milk who know how easi it is ambit call itself vocat good faith perchanc deceiv itself devote that it is monseigneur bienvenu poor humbl retir wa not account big mitr thi wa plain complet absenc young priest him we have seen that he did not take pari not singl futur dream engraft itself thi solitari old man not singl sprout ambit commit folli put forth it foliag hi shadow hi canon grand vicar were good old men rather vulgar like himself wall like him thi dioces exit cardinalship who resembl their bishop thi differ that they were finish he wa complet imposs grow great monseigneur bienvenu wa so well understood that no sooner had young men whom he ordain left seminari than they got themselv recommend archbishop aix or auch went off great hurri short we repeat it men wish be push saint who dwell paroxysm abneg is danger neighbor he might commun you contagion incur poverti anchylosi joint which are use advanc short more renunci than you desir thi infecti virtu is avoid henc isol monseigneur bienvenu we live midst gloomi societi success that is lesson which fall drop drop slope corrupt be it said pass that success is veri hideou thing it fals resembl merit deceiv men mass success ha almost same profil as supremaci success that menæchmu talent ha one dupe histori juven tacitu alon grumbl it our day philosophi which is almost offici ha enter it servic wear liveri success perform servic it antechamb succeed theori prosper argu capac win lotteri behold you are clever man he who triumph is vener be born silver spoon your mouth everyth lie that be lucki you will have all rest be happi peopl will think you great outsid five or six immens except which compos splendor centuri contemporari admir is noth but short sighted gild is gold it doe no harm be first arriv pure chanc so long as you do arriv common herd is old narcissu who ador himself who applaud vulgar herd that enorm abil virtu which madam magloir small plump vivaci mademoisel baptistin gentl slender frail somewhat taller than her brother dress gown puce color silk fashion 1806 which she had purchas that date pari which had last ever borrow vulgar phrase which possess merit give utter singl word idea which whole page would hardli suffic express madam magloir had air _peasant_ mademoisel baptistin that _lady_ madam magloir wore white quilt cap gold jeannett cross velvet ribbon her neck onli bit feminin jewelri that there wa hous veri white fichu puf gown coars black woollen stuff larg short sleev apron cotton cloth red green check knot round waist green ribbon stomach same attach two pin upper corner coars shoe her feet yellow stock like women marseil mademoisel baptistin s gown wa cut pattern 1806 short waist narrow sheath like skirt puf sleev flap button she conceal her gray hair frizz wig known as _baby_ wig madam magloir had intellig vivaci kindli air two corner her mouth unequ rais her upper lip which wa larger than lower impart her rather crab imperi look so long as monseigneur held hi peac she talk him resolut mixtur respect freedom but as soon as monseigneur began speak as we have seen she obey passiv like her mistress mademoisel baptistin did not even speak she confin herself obey pleas him she had never been pretti even when she wa young she had larg blue promin eye long arch nose but her whole visag her whole person breath forth ineff good as we state begin she had alway been predestin gentl but faith chariti hope those three virtu which mildli warm soul had gradual elev that gentl sanctiti natur had made her lamb religion had made her angel poor saint virgin sweet memori which ha vanish mademoisel baptistin ha so often narrat what pass episcop resid that even that there are mani peopl now live who still recal most minut detail moment when bishop enter madam magloir wa talk consider vivac she wa harangu mademoisel baptistin subject which wa familiar her which bishop wa also accustom question concern lock entranc door it appear that while procur some provis supper madam magloir had heard thing diver place peopl had spoken prowler evil appear suspici vagabond had he said loud voic see here my name is jean valjean i am convict galley i have pass nineteen year galley i wa liber four day ago am my way pontarli which is my destin i have been walk four day i left place no one would take me i went prison jailer would not admit me i went dog s kennel dog bit me chase me off as though he had been man one would have said that he knew who i wa i went field intend iniquit anger may be both foolish absurd one can be irrit wrong one is exasper onli when there is some show right one s side bottom jean valjean felt himself exasper besid human societi had done him day hi mother hi sister had he ever encount friendli word kindli glanc suffer suffer he had gradual arriv convict that life is war that thi war he wa conquer he had no other weapon than hi hate he had mind he went school age forti learn read write cipher he felt that fortifi hi intellig wa fortifi hi hate certain case educ enlighten can serv eke evil thi is sad thing say have judg societi which we have seen evil natur he wa still good when he arriv galley he there condemn societi felt that he wa becom wick he there condemn provid wa consciou that he wa becom impiou it is difficult not indulg which he had degre mount descend lugubri aspect which had so mani year form inner horizon hi spirit wa he consciou all that pass him all that wa work there that is someth which we do not presum state shadow he suffer shadow he hate shadow one might have said that he hate advanc himself he dwelt habitu thi shadow feel hi way like blind man dreamer onli interv there suddenli came him access wrath surcharg suffer livid rapid flash which illumin hi whole soul caus appear abruptli all around him front behind amid gleam fright light hideou precipic sombr perspect hi destini flash pass night close again where wa he he no longer knew peculiar pain thi natur which that which is pitiless that is say that which is brutal predomin is transform man littl littl sort stupid transfigur wild beast sometim feroci beast jean valjean s success obstin attempt escap would alon suffic prove thi strang work law human soul jean valjean would have renew these attempt utterli useless foolish as they were coloss final struggl had been begun hi vicious good that man presenc these light he proceed like man who is intox as he walk thu haggard eye did he have distinct percept what might result him hi adventur d did he understand all those mysteri murmur which warn or importun spirit certain moment life did voic whisper hi ear that he had just pass solemn hour hi destini that there no longer remain middl cours him that if he were not henceforth best men he would be worst that it behoov him now so speak mount higher than bishop or fall lower than convict that if he wish becom good he must becom angel that if he wish remain evil he must becom monster here again some question must be put which we have alreadi put ourselv elsewher did he catch some shadow all thi hi thought confus way misfortun certainli as we have said doe form educ intellig nevertheless it is doubt jean valjean wa condit disentangl all that we have here indic if these idea occur him he but caught glimps rather than saw them they onli succeed throw him unutter almost pain state emot emerg that black deform thing which is call galley bishop had hurt hi soul as too vivid light would have hurt hi eye emerg dark futur life possibl life which offer itself him henceforth all pure radiant fill him tremor anxieti he no longer knew where he realli wa like owl who should suddenli see sun rise convict had been dazzl blind as it were virtu that which wa certain that which he did not doubt wa that he wa no longer same man that everyth him wa chang that it wa no longer hi power make it as though bishop had not spoken him had not touch him thi state mind he had encount littl gervai had rob him hi forti sou whi he certainli could not have explain it wa thi last effect suprem effort as it were evil thought which he had brought away galley remnant impuls result what is call static _acquir forc _ it wa that it wa also perhap even less than that let us say it simpli it wa not he who stole it wa not man it wa beast who habit instinct had simpli place hi foot that money while intellig wa struggl amid so mani novel hitherto unheard thought beset it when intellig reawaken beheld that action brute jean valjean recoil anguish utter cri terror illustr awaken it wa becaus strang phenomenon one which wa possibl onli situat which he found himself steal money that child he had done thing which he wa no longer capabl howev that may be thi last evil action had decis effect him it abruptli travers that chao which he bore hi mind dispers it place one side thick obscur other light act hi soul state which it then wa as certain chemic reagent act troubl mixtur precipit one element clarifi other first all even examin himself reflect all bewild like one who seek save himself he tri find child order return hi money him then when he recogn fact that thi wa imposs he halt despair moment when he exclaim i am wretch he had just perceiv what he wa he wa alreadi separ himself such degre that he seem himself be no longer anyth more than phantom as if he had there him flesh blood hideou galley convict jean valjean cudgel hand hi blous hi hip hi knapsack fill stolen object hi back hi resolut gloomi visag hi thought fill abomin project excess unhappi had as we have remark made him some sort visionari thi then wa natur vision he actual saw that jean valjean that sinist face him he had almost reach point ask himself who that man wa he wa horrifi him hi brain wa go one those violent yet perfectli calm moment which reveri is so profound that it absorb realiti one no longer behold object which one ha one one see as though apart one s self figur which one ha one s own mind thu he contempl himself so speak face face same time athwart thi hallucin he perceiv mysteri depth sort light which he first took torch scrutin thi light which appear hi conscienc more attent he recogn fact that it possess human form that thi torch wa bishop hi conscienc weigh turn these two men thu place it bishop jean valjean noth less than first wa requir soften second one those singular effect which are peculiar thi sort ecstasi proport as hi reveri continu as bishop grew great resplend hi eye so did jean valjean grow less vanish certain time he wa no longer anyth more than shade all onc he disappear bishop alon remain he fill whole soul thi wretch man magnific radianc jean valjean wept long time he wept burn tear he sob more weak than woman more fright than child as he wept daylight penetr more more clearli hi soul extraordinari light light onc ravish terribl hi past life hi first fault hi long expiat hi extern brutish hi intern hard hi dismiss liberti rejoic manifold plan vengeanc what had happen him bishop s last thing that he had done that theft forti sou child crime all more cowardli all more monstrou it had come bishop s pardon all thi recur hi mind appear clearli him but clear which he had never hitherto wit he examin hi life it seem horribl him hi soul it seem fright him meantim gentl light rest thi life thi soul it seem him that he beheld satan light paradis how mani hour did he weep thu what did he do he had wept whither did he go no one ever knew onli thing which seem be authent is that disord beneath it they made beneath tabl nois clatter feet that wa abomin say molièr thi wa state which shepherd idyl begun five o clock morn had reach half past four afternoon sun wa set their appetit were satisfi champ élysé fill sunshin peopl were noth but light dust two thing which glori is compos hors marli those neigh marbl were pranc cloud gold carriag were go come squadron magnific bodi guard their clarion their head were descend avenu de neuilli white flag show faintli rosi set sun float dome tuileri place de la concord which had becom place loui xv onc more wa choke happi their laughter wa audibl everyth wa radiant it wa time undisput peac profound royalist secur it wa epoch when special privat report chief polic anglè king subject suburb pari termin these line take all thing consider sire there is noth be fear these peopl they are as heedless as indol as cat populac is restless provinc it is not pari these are veri pretti men sire it would take all two them make one your grenadi there is noth be fear part populac pari capit it is remark that statur thi popul should have diminish last fifti year populac suburb is still more puni than time revolut it is not danger short it is amiabl rabbl prefect polic do not deem it possibl that cat can transform itself lion that doe happen howev that lie miracl wrought populac pari moreov cat so despis count anglè possess esteem republ old their eye it wa liberti incarn as though serv as pendant minerva aptera piræu there stood public squar corinth coloss bronz figur cat ingenu polic restor beheld populac pari too rose color light it is not so much amiabl rabbl as it is thought parisian is frenchman what athenian wa greek no one sleep more soundli than he no one is more frankli frivol lazi than he no one can better assum air forget let him not be trust nevertheless he is readi ani sort cool deed but when there is glori end it he is worthi admir everi sort furi give him pike he will produc 10th august give him gun you will have austerlitz he is napoleon s stay danton s resourc is it question countri he enlist is it question liberti he tear pavement bewar hi hair fill wrath is epic hi blous drape itself like fold chlami take care he will make first rue grenétat which come hand caudin fork when hour strike thi man faubourg will grow statur thi littl man will aris hi gaze will be terribl hi breath will becom tempest there will issu forth that slender chest enough wind disarrang fold alp it is thank suburban man pari that revolut mix arm conquer europ he sing it is hi delight proport hi song hi natur you will see as long as he ha refrain noth but _la carmagnole_ he onli overthrow loui xvi make him sing _marseillaise_ he will free world thi note jot down margin anglè report we will sickli appear she gaze her daughter asleep her arm air peculiar mother who ha nurs her own child larg blue handkerchief such as invalid use wa fold fichu conceal her figur clumsili her hand were can be divin abandon straighten circumst fantin had immedi lost sight favourit zéphine dahlia bond onc broken side men it wa loos women they would have been greatli astonish had ani one told them fortnight later that they had been friend there no longer exist ani reason such thing fantin had remain alon father her child gone ala such ruptur are irrevoc she found herself absolut isol minu habit work plu tast pleasur drawn away her _liaison_ tholomyè disdain pretti trade which she knew she had neglect keep her market open it wa now close her she had no resourc fantin bare knew how read did not know how write her childhood she had onli been taught sign her name she had public letter writer indit epistl tholomyè then second then third tholomyè repli none them fantin heard gossip say as they look her child who take those children serious one onli shrug one s shoulder such children then she thought tholomyè who had shrug hi shoulder hi child who did not take that innoc be serious her heart grew gloomi that man but what wa she do she no longer knew whom appli she had commit fault but foundat her natur as will be rememb wa modesti virtu she wa vagu consciou that she wa verg fall distress glide wors state courag wa necessari she possess it held herself firm idea return her nativ town m sur m occur her there some one might possibl know her give her work ye but it would be necessari conceal her fault confus way she perceiv necess separ which would be more pain than first one her heart contract but she took her resolut fantin as we shall see had fierc braveri life she had alreadi valiantli renounc fineri had dress herself linen had put all her silk all her ornament all her ribbon all her lace her daughter onli vaniti which wa left her holi one it wa she sold all that she had which produc her two hundr franc her littl debt paid she had onli eighti franc left age twenti two beauti spring morn she quit pari bear her child her back ani one who had seen these two pass would have had piti them thi woman had all world noth but her child child had all world no one but thi woman fantin had nurs her child thi had tire her chest she cough littl we shall have no further occas speak m félix tholomyè let us confin ourselv say that twenti year later king loui philipp he wa great provinci lawyer wealthi influenti wise elector veri sever juryman he wa still man pleasur middl day have time time sake rest herself travel three or four sou leagu what wa then known as _petit voitur de environ de paris_ littl suburban coach servic fantin found herself montfermeil alley boulang as she pass thénardier hostelri two littl girl bliss monster swing had dazzl her manner she had halt front that vision joy charm exist these two littl girl were charm thi mother she gaze them much emot presenc angel is announc paradis she thought that thi inn she beheld mysteri here provid these two littl creatur were evid happi she gaze them she admir them such emot that moment when their mother wa recov her breath two couplet her song she could not refrain address her remark which we have just read you have two pretti children madam most feroci creatur are disarm caress bestow their young mother rais her head thank her bade wayfar sit down bench door she herself be seat threshold two women began chat my name is madam thénardier said mother two littl girl we keep thi inn then her mind still run her romanc she resum hum her teeth it must be so i am knight i am off palestin thi madam thénardier wa sandi complexion woman thin angular type soldier s wife all it unpleas what wa odd languish air which she owe her perus romanc she wa simper but masculin creatur old romanc produc that effect when rub against imagin cook shop woman she wa still young she wa bare thirti if thi crouch woman had stood upright her lofti statur her frame perambul colossu suitabl fair might have frighten travel outset troubl her confid disturb what caus what we have relat vanish person who is seat instead stand erect destini hang such thing as that travel told her stori slight modif that she wa work woman that her husband wa dead that her work pari had fail her that she wa her way year age he wa inspector hi youth he had been employ convict establish south proceed further let us come understand as word human face which we have just appli javert human face javert consist flat make or if reader will have it so authent demon who place styx base societi he wa stoical seriou auster melancholi dreamer humbl haughti like fanat hi glanc wa like gimlet cold pierc hi whole life hung these two word watch supervis he had introduc straight line what is most crook thing world he possess conscienc hi use religion hi function he wa spi as other men are priest woe man who fell hi hand he would have arrest hi own father if latter had escap galley would have denounc hi mother if she had broken her ban he would have done it that sort inward satisfact which is confer virtu withal life privat isol abneg chastiti never divers it wa implac duti polic understood as spartan understood sparta pitiless lie wait feroci honesti marbl inform brutu vidocq javert s whole person wa express man who spi who withdraw himself observ mystic school joseph de maistr which that epoch season lofti cosmogoni those thing which were call ultra newspap would not have fail declar that javert wa symbol hi brow wa not visibl it disappear beneath hi hat hi eye were not visibl they were lost hi eyebrow hi chin wa not visibl it wa plung hi cravat hi hand were not visibl they were drawn hi sleev hi cane wa not visibl he carri it hi coat but when occas present itself there wa suddenli seen emerg all thi shadow as ambuscad narrow angular forehead bale glanc threaten chin enorm hand monstrou cudgel hi leisur moment which were far frequent he read although he hate book thi caus him be not wholli illiter thi could be recogn some emphasi hi speech as we have said he had no vice when he wa pleas himself he permit himself pinch snuff therein lay hi connect human reader will have no difficulti understand that javert wa terror that whole class which annual statist ministri justic design rubric vagrant name javert rout them it mere utter face javert petrifi them sight such wa thi formid man javert wa like eye constantli fix m madelein eye full suspicion conjectur m madelein had final perceiv fact but it seem be no import him he did not even put question javert he neither sought nor avoid him he bore that embarrass almost oppress gaze appear notic it he treat javert eas courtesi as he did all rest world it wa divin some word which escap javert that he had secretli investig that curios which belong race which there enter as much instinct as will all anterior trace which father madelein might have left elsewher he seem know he sometim said covert word that some one had glean certain inform certain district famili which had disappear onc he chanc say as he wa talk himself i think i have him then he remain pensiv three day utter not word it seem that thread which he thought he held had broken moreov thi furnish necessari correct too absolut sens which certain word might present there can be noth realli infal human creatur peculiar instinct is that it can becom confus thrown off track defeat otherwis it would be superior intellig beast would be found be provid better fauchelev one morn m madelein wa pass unpav alley m sur m he heard nois saw group some distanc away he approach old man name father fauchelev had just fallen beneath hi cart hi hors have tumbl down famili nor children he had turn carter hors had two broken leg could not rise old man wa caught wheel fall had been so unlucki that whole weight vehicl rest hi breast cart wa quit heavili laden father fauchelev wa rattl throat most lament manner they had tri but vain drag him unmethod effort aid awkwardli given wrong shake might kill him it wa imposs disengag him otherwis than lift vehicl off him javert who had come moment accid had sent jack screw m madelein arriv peopl stood asid respect help cri old fauchelev who will be good save old man m madelein turn those present is there jack screw be had one ha been sent answer peasant how long will it take get it they have gone nearest flachot s place where there is farrier but it make no differ it will take good quarter hour quarter hour exclaim madelein it had rain preced night soil wa soak cart wa sink deeper earth everi moment crush old carter s breast more more it wa evid that hi rib would be broken five minut more it is imposs wait anoth beneath it rais it hi back onli half minut poor man can be taken is there ani one here who ha stout loin heart there are five loui d or be earn not man group stir ten loui said madelein person present wrong get angri you know that one is not master one s self first moment one give way vivac then when some one put someth cold down your back just when you are not expect it i did wrong spoil that gentleman s hat whi did he go away i would ask hi pardon oh my god it make no differ me i ask hi pardon do me favor day thi onc monsieur javert hold you do not know that prison one can earn onli seven sou day it is not govern s fault but seven sou is one s earn just fanci i must pay one hundr franc or my littl girl will be sent me oh my god i cannot have her me what i do is so vile oh my cosett oh my littl angel holi virgin what will becom her poor creatur i will tell you it is thénardier inn keeper peasant such peopl are unreason they want money don t put me prison you see there is littl girl who will be turn street get as best she may veri heart winter you must have piti such be my good monsieur javert if she were older she might earn her live but it cannot be done that age i am not bad woman bottom it is not cowardli gluttoni that have made me what i am if i have drunk brandi it wa miseri i do not love it but it benumb sens when i wa happi it wa onli necessari glanc my closet it would have been evid that i wa not coquettish untidi woman i had linen great deal linen have piti me monsieur javert she spoke thu rent twain shaken sob blind tear her neck bare wring her hand cough solemn word _ etern father person could do noth more _ she understood that her fate wa seal she sank down murmur merci javert turn hi back soldier seiz her arm few moment earlier man had enter but no one had paid ani heed him he shut door lean hi back against it listen fantin s despair supplic instant when soldier laid their hand unfortun woman who would not rise he emerg shadow said one moment if you pleas javert rais hi eye recogn m madelein he remov hi hat salut him sort aggriev awkward excus me mr mayor word mr mayor produc curiou effect fantin she rose her feet one bound like spectr spring wipe hi face said inspector javert set thi woman liberti javert felt that he wa verg go mad he experienc that moment blow blow almost simultan most violent emot which he had ever undergon all hi life actual forc becom bad woman now you understand how it is that that blackguard mayor caus all mischief that i stamp that gentleman s hat front offic café but he had spoil my whole dress snow we women myself whi i should be blackguard those who say that blackguard javert would be right mr mayor i do not desir that you should treat me kindli your kind rous suffici bad blood me when it wa direct seventh champmathieu affair chapter i sister simplic incid reader is perus were not all known m sur m but small portion them which becam known left such memori that town that seriou gap would exist accept thi heavi peasant earthenwar which is easili fashion capuchin or ursulin these rustic are util rough work devot transit drover carmelit is not least violent one turn other much effort fund ignor common villag cloister is prepar readi hand place boor onc same foot as monk littl more amplitud smock it becom frock sister perpétu wa robust nun marin near pontois who chatter her patoi drone have their convent onli hous sick cell onli hire room chapel onli their parish church cloister onli street town ward hospit enclosur onli obedi grate onli fear god veil onli modesti thi ideal wa realiz live person sister simplic she had never been young it seem as though she would never grow old no one could have told sister simplic s age she wa person we dare not say woman who wa gentl auster well bred cold who had never lie she wa so gentl that she appear fragil but she wa more solid than granit she touch unhappi finger that were charmingli pure fine there wa so speak silenc her speech she said just what wa necessari she possess tone voic which would have equal edifi confession or enchant draw room thi delicaci accommod itself serg gown find thi harsh contact continu remind virtu she wa almost renown congreg thi imperturb verac abbé sicard speak sister simplic letter deaf mute massieu howev pure sincer we may be we all bear our candor crack littl innoc lie she did not littl lie innoc lie doe such thing exist lie is absolut form evil lie littl is not possibl he who lie lie whole lie lie is veri face demon satan ha two name he is call satan lie that is what she thought as she thought so she did result wa white which we have mention white which cover even her lip her eye radianc her smile wa white her glanc wa white there wa not singl spider s web not grain dust glass window that conscienc enter order saint vincent de paul she had taken name simplic special choic simplic sicili as we know is saint who prefer allow both her breast be torn off rather than say that she had been born segesta when she had been born syracus lie which would have save her thi patron saint suit thi soul sister simplic her entranc order had had two fault which she had gradual call me _old fellow_ those are my baptism name take that as you like i have been auvergn i have been faverol pardi well can t man have been auvergn or faverol have been galley i tell you that i have not stolen that i am father champmathieu i have been m baloup i have had settl resid you worri me your nonsens there whi is everybodi pursu me so furious district attorney had remain stand he address presid monsieur le président view confus but exceedingli clever denial prison who would like pass himself off as idiot but who will not succeed so do we shall attend that we demand that it shall pleas that it wa necessari that sun should come dri soil but sun did not make it appear it wa no longer rendezv austerlitz when first cannon wa fire english gener colvil look hi watch note that it wa thirti our grenadi pictur not strateg line what salvat rosa requir not what is suit need gribeauv certain amount tempest is alway mingl battl _quid obscurum quid divinum_ each historian trace some extent particular featur which pleas him amid thi pell mell whatev may be combin gener shock arm mass ha incalcul ebb action plan two leader enter each other becom mutual thrown shape such point field battl devour more combat than such anoth just as more or less spongi soil soak more or less quickli water which is pour them it becom necessari pour more soldier than one would like seri expenditur which are unforeseen line battl wave undul like thread trail blood gush illog front armi waver regiment form cape gulf as they enter withdraw all these reef are continu move front each other where infantri plancenoit form nineteenth centuri might perhap have been differ napoleon would have won battl waterloo ani other rout than that plancenoit prussian armi would have come ravin impass artilleri bülow would not have arriv now prussian gener muffl declar that one hour s delay blücher would not have found wellington hi feet battl wa lost it wa time that bülow should arriv as will be seen he had moreov been veri much delay he had bivouack dion le mont had set daybreak but road were impass hi divis stuck fast mire rut were hub cannon moreov he had been oblig pass dyle narrow bridg wavr street lead bridg had been fire french so caisson ammunit wagon could not pass two row burn hous had been oblig wait conflagr wa extinguish it wa midday bülow s vanguard had been abl reach chapel saint lambert had action been begun two hour earlier it would have been four o clock blücher would have fallen battl won napoleon such are these immens risk proport infinit which we cannot comprehend emperor had been first as earli as midday descri hi field glass extrem horizon someth which had attract hi attent he had said i see yonder cloud which seem me be troop then he ask duc de dalmati soult evid he had larg pocket hi coat time time he halt scrutin plain around him as though see he were observ bent abruptli disturb someth silent motionless ground then rose fled hi slide motion hi attitud attitud moment when he rose there wa no longer ring hand he did not precis rise he remain stoop frighten attitud hi back turn heap dead scan horizon hi knee whole upper portion hi bodi support hi two forefing which rest earth hi head peer edg hollow road jackal s four paw suit some action then come decis he rose hi feet that moment he gave terribl start he felt some one clutch him behind he wheel round it wa open hand which had close had seiz skirt hi coat honest man would have been terrifi thi man burst laugh come said he it s onli dead bodi i prefer spook gendarm but hand weaken releas him moment later he wa drag lifeless or least unconsci man shadow hollow road he wa cuirassi offic even offic consider rank larg gold epaulett peep beneath cuirass thi offic no longer possess helmet preserv him be crush hi eye were still close hi cuirass he wore silver cross legion honor prowler tore off thi cross which disappear one gulf which he had beneath hi great coat then he felt offic s chapter i water question montfermeil montfermeil is situat livri chell southern edg that lofti tabl land which separ ourcq marn present day it is toler larg town ornament all year plaster villa sunday beam bourgeoi 1823 there were montfermeil neither so mani white hous nor so mani well satisfi citizen it wa onli villag forest some pleasur hous last centuri were be met there be sure which were recogniz their grand air their balconi twist iron their long window whose tini pane cast all sort vari shade green white close shutter but montfermeil wa nonetheless villag retir cloth merchant rustic attorney had not discov it as yet it wa peac charm place which wa not road anywher there peopl live cheapli that peasant rustic life which is so bounteou so easi onli water wa rare there account elev plateau it wa necessari fetch it consider distanc end villag gagni drew it water magnific pond which exist wood there other end which surround church which lie direct chell found drink water onli littl spring half way down slope near road chell quarter hour montfermeil thu each household found it hard work keep suppli water larg hous aristocraci which thénardier tavern form part paid half farth bucket man who made busi it who earn eight sou day hi enterpris suppli montfermeil water but thi good man onli work seven o clock even summer five winter night onc come shutter ground floor onc close he who had no water drink went fetch it himself or did it thi constitut terror poor creatur whom reader ha probabl not forgotten littl cosett it will be rememb that cosett wa use thénardier two way they made mother pay them they made child serv them so when mother ceas pay altogeth reason which we have read preced chapter thénardier kept cosett she took place servant their hous thi capac she it wa who ran fetch water when it wa requir so child who wa greatli terrifi idea go spring night took great care that water should never be lack hous christma year 1823 wa particularli brilliant montfermeil begin winter had been mild there had been neither snow nor frost that time some mountebank pari had obtain permiss mayor erect their booth princip street villag band itiner merchant protect same toler had construct their stall church squar even extend them boulang alley where as reader will perhap rememb thénardier hostelri wa situat these peopl fill inn drink shop commun that tranquil littl district noisi joyou life order play part faith historian we ought even add that curios display squar there wa menageri which fright clown clad rag come no one knew whenc exhibit peasant montfermeil 1823 one those horribl brazilian vultur such as our royal museum did not possess 1845 which have tricolor cockad eye i believ that naturalist call thi bird caracara polyboru it belong order apicid famili vultur some good old bonapartist soldier who had retir villag went see thi creatur great devot mountebank gave that tricolor cockad wa uniqu phenomenon made god expressli follow were audibl amid uproar nanterr suresn vine have flourish greatli when ten piec were reckon there have been twelv they have yield great deal juic press but grape cannot be ripe those part grape should not be ripe wine turn oili as soon as spring come then it is veri thin wine there are wine poorer even than these grape must be gather while green etc or miller would call are we respons what is sack we find them quantiti small seed which we cannot sift which we are oblig send mill stone there are tare fennel vetch hempse fox tail host other weed not mention pebbl which abound certain wheat especi breton wheat i am not fond grind breton wheat ani more than long sawyer like saw beam nail them you can judg bad dust that make grind then peopl complain flour they are wrong flour is no fault our space two window mower who wa seat tabl land proprietor who wa fix price some meadow work be perform spring wa say it doe no harm have grass wet it cut better dew is good thing sir it make no differ that grass your grass is young veri hard cut still it s terribl tender it yield iron etc cosett wa her usual place seat cross bar kitchen tabl near chimney she wa rag her bare feet were thrust wooden shoe firelight she wa engag knit woollen stock destin young thénardier veri young kitten wa play chair laughter chatter were audibl adjoin room two fresh children s voic it wa éponin azelma chimney corner cat o nine tail wa hang nail interv cri veri young child which wa somewher hous rang nois dram shop it wa littl boy who had been born thénardier one preced winter she did not know whi she said result cold who wa littl more than three year old mother had nurs him but she did not love him when persist clamor brat becam too annoy your son is squall thénardier would say do go see what he want bah mother would repli he bother me neglect child continu shriek dark chapter ii two complet portrait so far thi book thénardier have been view onli profil moment ha arriv make that woman certain moment she beheld him like light candl other she felt him like claw thi woman wa formid creatur who love no one her children who did not fear ani one her husband she wa mother father is aliv that he is watch her short there are thing which are not possibl i do not even know your name if you were take her away i should say well lark what ha becom her one must least see some passport travel five leagu pari if i take cosett away i shall take her away that is end matter you will not know my name you will not know my resid you will not know where she is my intent is that she shall never set eye you again so long as she live i break thread which bind her foot she depart doe that suit you ye or no genius like demon recogn presenc superior god certain sign thénardier comprehend that he had deal veri strong person it wa like intuit he comprehend it hi clear sagaci promptitud while drink carter smoke sing coars song preced even he had devot whole time observ stranger watch him like cat studi him like mathematician he had watch him both hi own account pleasur thing instinct had spi him as though he had been paid so do not movement not gestur part man yellow great coat had escap him even stranger had so clearli manifest hi interest cosett thénardier had divin hi purpos he had caught old man s deep glanc return constantli child who wa thi man whi thi interest whi thi hideou costum when he had so much money hi purs question which he put himself be abl solv them which irrit him he had ponder it all night long he could not be cosett s father wa he her grandfath then whi not make himself known onc when one ha right one assert it thi man evid had no right cosett what wa it then thénardier lost himself conjectur he caught glimps everyth but he saw noth be that as it may enter convers man sure that there wa some secret case that latter had some interest remain shadow he felt himself strong when he perceiv stranger s clear firm retort that thi mysteri personag wa mysteri so simpl way he becam consciou that he wa weak he had expect noth sort hi conjectur were put rout he ralli hi idea he weigh everyth space second thénardier wa one those men who take situat glanc he decid that moment had arriv proceed straightforward quickli that he did as great leader do decis moment which they know that they alon recogn he abruptli unmask hi batteri sir said he i am need fifteen hundr franc stranger took hi side pocket old pocketbook black leather open it drew three bank bill which he laid tabl then he place hi larg thumb note said inn keeper go fetch cosett while thi wa take place what had cosett been do wake cosett had run get her shoe it she had found gold piec it wa not napoleon it wa one those perfectli new twenti franc piec restor whose effigi littl prussian queue had replac laurel wreath cosett wa dazzl her destini began intox her she did not know what gold piec wa she had never seen one she hid it quickli her pocket as though she had stolen it still she felt that it realli wa her she guess whenc her gift had come but joy which she experienc wa full fear she wa happi all she wa stupefi such magnific beauti thing did not appear real doll frighten her gold piec frighten her she trembl vagu presenc thi magnific stranger alon did not frighten her contrari he reassur her ever preced even amid all her amaz even her sleep she had been think her littl childish mind that man who seem be so poor so sad who wa so rich so kind everyth had chang her she had met that good man forest cosett less happi than most insignific swallow heaven had never known what it wa take refug mother s shadow wing last five year that is say as far back as her memori ran poor child had shiver trembl she had alway been expos complet nake sharp wind advers now it seem her she wa cloth formerli her soul had seem cold now it wa warm cosett wa no longer afraid thénardier she wa no longer alon there wa some one there she hastili set her regular morn duti that loui which she had her veri apron pocket whenc fifteen sou piec had fallen night distract her thought she dare not touch it but she spent five minut gaze it her tongu hang if truth must be told as she swept staircas she paus remain stand there motionless forget her broom entir univers occupi gaze that star which wa blaze bottom her pocket it wa one these period contempl that thénardier join her she had gone search cosett her husband s order what wa quit unpreced she neither struck her nor said insult word her cosett she said almost gentli come immedi instant later cosett enter public room stranger took bundl which he had brought unti it thi bundl contain littl woollen gown apron fustian bodic kerchief petticoat woollen stock shoe complet outfit girl seven year all wa black my child said man take these go dress yourself quickli daylight wa appear when those inhabit montfermeil who had begun open their door beheld poorli clad old man lead littl girl dress mourn carri pink someth as though she were besid good god chapter x he who seek better himself may render hi situat wors madam thénardier had allow her husband have hi own way as wa her wont she had expect great man she felt that which she had never felt sensat expans man no longer produc her effect be old or poor she thought jean valjean handsom just as she thought hovel pretti these are effect dawn full interest men seem him good just he no longer reproach ani one thought he saw no reason whi he should not live be veri old man now that thi child love him he saw whole futur stretch him illumin cosett as charm light best us are not exempt egotist thought time he reflect sort joy that she would be ugli thi is onli person opinion but utter our whole thought point where jean valjean had arriv when he began love cosett it is no mean clear us that he did not need thi encourag order that he might persever well do he had just view malic men miseri societi new aspect incomplet aspect which unfortun onli exhibit one side truth fate woman as sum fantin public author as personifi javert he had return prison thi time have done right he had quaf fresh bitter disgust lassitud were overpow him even memori bishop probabl suffer temporari eclips though sure reappear later lumin triumphant but all that sacr memori wa grow dim who know jean valjean had not been eve grow discourag fall onc more he love grew strong again ala he walk no less indecis than cosett he protect her she strengthen him thank him she could walk life thank her he could continu virtu he wa that child s stay she wa hi prop oh unfathom divin mysteri balanc destini chapter iv remark princip tenant jean valjean wa prudent enough never go day everi even twilight he walk hour or two sometim alon often cosett seek most desert side alley boulevard enter church nightfal he like go saint médard which is nearest church when he did not take cosett him she remain old woman but child s delight wa go good man she prefer hour him all her raptur _tête à têtes_ catherin he held her hand as they walk said sweet thing her it turn that cosett wa veri gay littl person old woman attend housekeep cook went market they live which tower garden moment when hubbub demon retreat one would have said that choir angel wa approach gloom cosett jean valjean fell their knee they knew not what it wa they knew not where they were voic were sing jean valjean thought noth he no longer beheld night he beheld blue sky it seem him that he felt those wing which we all have us unfold song die away it may have last long time jean valjean could not have told hour ecstasi are never more than moment all fell silent again there wa no longer anyth street there wa noth garden that which had menac that which had reassur him all had vanish breez sway few dri weed crest wall they gave faint sweet melancholi sound chapter vii continu enigma night wind had risen which indic that it must be one two o clock morn poor cosett said noth as she had seat herself besid him lean her head against him jean valjean had fanci that she wa asleep he bent down look her cosett s eye were wide open her thought air pain jean valjean she wa still trembl are you sleepi said jean valjean i am veri cold she repli moment later she resum is she still there who said jean valjean madam thénardier jean valjean had alreadi forgotten mean which he had employ make cosett keep silent ah said he she is gone you need fear noth further child sigh as though load had been lift her breast ground wa damp shed open all side breez grew more keen everi instant goodman took off hi coat wrap it round cosett are you less cold now said he oh ye father well wait me moment i will soon be back he quit ruin crept larg build seek better shelter he came across door but they were close there were bar all window ground floor just he had turn inner angl edific he observ that he wa come some arch window where he perceiv light he stood tipto peep one these window they all open toler vast hall pave larg flagston cut arcad pillar where onli tini light great shadow were visibl light came taper which wa burn one corner apart wa desert noth wa stir it nevertheless
