have said judg sort serpent which undul floor that thi sinist form had rope round it neck whole chamber wa bath that mist place which are spare illumin which add horror jean valjean often said our way it take reader say transgress proper bound thing which stori teller have never seen have therefor never describ chapter ii obedi martin verga thi convent which 1824 had alreadi exist mani long year rue petit picpu wa commun bernardin obedi martin verga these bernardin were attach consequ not clairvaux like bernardin monk but cîteaux like benedictin monk other word they were subject not saint bernard but saint benoît ani one who ha turn old folio ani extent know that martin verga found 1425 congreg bernardin benedictin salamanca head order alcala as branch establish thi congreg had hermit wa chase ancient templ apollo where he dwelt saint benoît then age seventeen rule carmelit who go barefoot wear bit willow their throat never sit down harshest rule is that bernardin benedictin martin verga they are cloth black guimp which accord express command saint benoît mount chin robe serg larg sleev larg woollen veil guimp which mount chin cut squar breast band which descend their brow their eye thi is their dress all is black band which is white novic wear same habit but all white profess nun also wear rosari their side bernardin benedictin martin verga practis perpetu ador like benedictin call ladi holi sacrament who begin thi centuri had two hous pari one templ other rue neuv saint genevièv howev bernardin benedictin petit picpu whom we are speak were total differ order ladi holi sacrament cloister rue neuv saint genevièv templ there were numer differ their rule there were some their costum bernardin benedictin petit picpu wore black guimp benedictin holi sacrament rue neuv saint genevièv wore white one had besid their breast holi sacrament three inch long silver gilt or gild copper nun petit picpu did not wear thi holi sacrament perpetu ador which wa common hous petit picpu hous templ leav those two order perfectli distinct their onli resembl lie thi practic ladi holi sacrament bernardin martin verga just as there exist similar studi glorif all mysteri relat infanc life death jesu christ virgin two order which were nevertheless wide separ occas even hostil oratori itali establish florenc philip de neri oratori franc establish pierr de bérull oratori franc claim preced philip de neri wa onli saint while bérull wa cardin let us return harsh spanish rule martin verga bernardin benedictin thi obedi fast all year round abstain meat fast lent mani other day which are peculiar them rise their first sleep one three o clock morn read their breviari chant matin sleep all season serg sheet straw make no use bath never light fire scourg themselv everi friday observ rule silenc speak each other onli recreat hour which are veri brief wear drugget chemis six month year septemb 14th which is exalt holi cross easter these six month are modif rule say all year but thi drugget chemis intoler heat summer produc fever nervou spasm use it had be restrict even thi palliat when nun put thi chemis 14th septemb they suffer fever three or four day obedi poverti chastiti persever their seclus these are their vow which rule greatli aggrav prioress is elect three year mother who are call _mère vocales_ becaus they have voic chapter prioress can onli be re elect twice which fix longest possibl reign prioress nine year they never see offici priest who is alway hidden them serg curtain nine feet height sermon when preacher is chapel they drop their veil their face they must alway speak low walk their eye ground their head bow one man onli is allow enter convent archbishop dioces there is realli one other garden but he is alway old man order that he may alway be alon garden that nun may be warn avoid him bell is attach hi knee their submiss prioress is absolut passiv it is canon subject full forc it abneg as voic christ _ut voci christi_ gestur first sign _ad nutum ad primum signum_ immedi cheer persever certain blind obedi _prompt hilarit perseverant et cæca quadam obedientia_ as file hand workman _quasi limam manibu fabri_ power read or write express permiss _leger vel scriber non addiscerit sine expressa superiori licentia_ each one them turn make what they call _reparation_ repar is prayer all sin all fault all dissens all violat all iniqu all crime commit earth space twelv consecut hour four o clock afternoon till four o clock morn or four o clock morn four o clock afternoon sister who is make _reparation_ remain her knee stone holi sacrament hand clasp rope around her neck when her fatigu becom unendur she prostrat herself flat her face against earth her arm outstretch form cross thi is her onli relief thi attitud she pray all guilti univers thi is great sublim as thi act is perform front post which burn candl it is call distinct _to make reparation_ or _to be post_ nun even prefer humil thi last express which contain idea tortur abas _to make reparation_ is function which whole soul is absorb sister post would not turn round were thunderbolt fall directli behind her besid thi there is alway sister kneel holi sacrament thi station last hour they reliev each other like soldier guard thi is perpetu ador prioress mother almost alway bear name stamp peculiar solemn recal not saint martyr but moment life jesu christ as mother nativ mother concept mother present mother passion but name saint are not interdict when one see them one never see anyth but their mouth all their teeth are yellow no tooth brush ever enter that convent brush one s teeth is top ladder whose bottom is loss one s soul they never say _my_ they possess noth their own they must not attach themselv anyth they call everyth _our_ thu our veil our chaplet if they were speak their chemis they would say _our chemise_ sometim they grow attach some petti object book hour relic medal that ha been bless as soon as they becom awar that they are grow attach thi object they must give it they recal word saint thérèse whom great ladi said as she wa point enter her order permit me mother send bibl which i am greatli attach ah you are attach someth that case do not enter our order everi person whatev is forbidden shut herself have _a place her own chamber_ they live their cell open when they meet one say bless ador be most holi sacrament altar other respond forev same ceremoni when one tap other s door hardli ha she touch door when soft voic other side is heard say hastili forev like all practic thi becom mechan forc habit one sometim say _forever_ other ha had time say rather long sentenc prais ador be most holi sacrament altar visitandin one who enter say ave maria one whose cell is enter say gratia plena it is their way say good day which is fact full grace each hour day three supplementari stroke sound church bell convent thi signal prioress vocal mother profess nun lay sister novic postul interrupt what they are say what they are do or what they are think all say unison if it is five o clock instanc five o clock all hour prais ador be most holi sacrament altar if it is eight o clock eight o clock all hour so accord hour thi custom object which is break thread thought lead it back constantli god exist mani commun formula alon vari thu infant jesu they say thi hour everi hour may love jesu kindl my heart bernardin benedictin martin verga cloister fifti year ago petit picpu chant offic solemn psalmodi pure gregorian chant alway full voic whole cours offic everywher missal where asterisk occur they paus say low voic jesu mari joseph offic dead they adopt tone so low that voic women can hardli descend such depth effect produc is strike tragic nun petit picpu had made vault their grand altar burial their commun _the government_ as they say doe not permit thi vault receiv coffin so they leav convent when they die thi is afflict them caus them constern as infract rule they had obtain mediocr consol best permiss be inter special hour special corner ancient vaugirard cemeteri which wa made land which had formerli belong their commun friday nun hear high mass vesper all offic as sunday they scrupul observ addit all littl festiv unknown peopl world which church franc wa so prodig olden day which it is still prodig spain itali their station chapel are intermin as number durat their prayer we can convey no better idea them than quot ingenu remark one them prayer postul are fright prayer novic are still wors prayer profess nun are still wors onc week chapter assembl prioress presid vocal mother assist each sister kneel turn stone confess aloud presenc all fault sin which she ha commit week vocal mother consult each confess inflict penanc aloud besid thi confess loud tone which all fault least seriou are reserv they have their venial offenc what they call _coulp make one s coulpe_ mean prostrat one s self flat one s face offic front prioress latter who is never call anyth but _our mother_ notifi culprit slight tap her foot against wood her stall that she can rise _coulpe_ or _peccavi_ is made veri small matter broken glass torn veil involuntari delay few second offic fals note church etc thi suffic _coulpe_ is made _coulpe_ is entir spontan it is culpabl person herself word is etymolog it place here who judg herself inflict it herself festiv day sunday four mother precentor inton offic larg read desk four place one day one mother precentor inton psalm begin _ecce_ instead _ecce_ she utter aloud three note _do si sol_ thi piec absent minded she underw _coulpe_ which last whole servic what render fault enorm wa fact that chapter had laugh when nun is summon parlor even were it prioress herself she drop her veil as will be rememb so that onli her mouth is visibl prioress alon can hold commun stranger other can see onli their immedi famili that veri rare if chanc outsid present herself see nun or one whom she ha known love outer world regular seri negoti is requir if it is woman author may sometim be grant nun come they talk her shutter which are open onli mother or sister it is unnecessari say that permiss is alway refus men such is rule saint benoît aggrav martin verga these nun are not gay rosi fresh as daughter other order often are they are pale grave 1825 1830 three them went mad chapter iii auster one is postul two year least often four novic four it is rare that definit vow can be pronounc earlier than age twenti three or twenti four year bernardin benedictin martin verga do not admit widow their order their cell they deliv themselv mani unknown macer which they must never speak day when novic make her profess she is dress her handsomest attir she is crown white rose her hair is brush it shine curl then she prostrat herself great black veil is thrown her offic dead is sung then nun separ two file one file pass close her say plaintiv accent our sister is dead other file respond voic ecstasi our sister is aliv jesu christ epoch when thi stori take place board school wa attach convent board school young girl nobl mostli wealthi famili whom could be remark mademoisel de saint aulair de bélissen english girl bear illustri cathol name talbot these young girl rear these nun four wall grew horror world age one them said us one day sight street pavement made me shudder head foot they were dress blue white cap holi spirit silver gilt or copper their breast certain grand festiv day particularli saint martha s day they were permit as high favor suprem happi dress themselv as nun carri offic practic saint benoît whole day earli day nun were habit lend them their black garment thi seem profan prioress forbad it onli novic were permit lend it is remark that these perform toler encourag no doubt convent secret spirit proselyt order give these children foretast holi habit were genuin happi real recreat scholar they simpli amus themselv it _it wa new it gave them change_ candid reason childhood which do not howev succeed make us worldl comprehend felic hold holi water sprinkler one s hand stand hour togeth sing hard enough four front read desk pupil conform except auster all practic convent there wa certain young woman who enter world who mani year marri life had not succeed break herself habit say great hast whenev ani one knock her door forev like nun pupil saw their rel onli parlor their veri mother did not obtain permiss embrac them follow illustr what degre sever that point wa carri one day young girl receiv visit her mother who wa accompani littl sister three gayeti nonetheless these young girl fill thi grave hous charm souvenir certain hour childhood sparkl that cloister recreat hour struck door swung it hing bird said good here come children irrupt youth girl burst forth sudden more sweetli than nois bee hive joy wa open each one brought her honey they play they call each other they form group they ran pretti littl white teeth chatter corner veil superintend laugh distanc shade kept watch sunbeam but what matter it still they beam laugh those four lugubri wall had their moment dazzl brillianc they look vagu blanch reflect so much joy thi sweet littl one skip elder one danc thi cloister play wa mingl heaven noth is so delight so august as all these fresh expand young soul homer would have come thither laugh perrault there wa that black garden youth health nois cri giddi pleasur happi enough smooth wrinkl all their ancestress those epic as well as those fairi tale those throne as well as those thatch cottag hecuba la mère grand that hous more than anywher els perhap aris those children s say which are so grace which evok smile that is full thought it wa those four gloomi wall that child five year exclaim one day mother one big girl ha just told me that i have onli nine year ten month longer remain here what happi it wa here too that thi memor dialogu took place _a vocal mother_ whi are you weep my child _the child_ age six i told alix that i knew my french histori she say that i do not know it but i do _alix_ big girl age nine no she doe not know it _the mother_ how is that my child _alix_ she told me open book random ask her ani question book she would answer it well she did not answer it let us see it what did you ask her i open book random as she propos i put first question that i came across what wa question it mother whose turn it wa who if fli took notion fli or hum against rule open shut wooden book time time thi silenc wa season live saint read aloud littl pulpit desk which wa situat foot crucifix reader wa one big girl weekli turn regular distanc bare tabl there were larg varnish bowl which pupil wash their own silver cup knive fork which they sometim threw some scrap tough meat or spoil fish thi wa punish these bowl were call _rond d eau_ child who broke silenc made cross her tongu where ground she lick pavement dust that end all joy wa charg chastis those poor littl rose leav which had been guilti chirp there wa convent book which ha never been print as _uniqu copy_ which it is forbidden read it is rule saint benoît arcanum which no profan eye must penetr _nemo regula seu constitution nostra externi communicabit_ pupil one day succeed get possess thi book set read it avid read which wa often interrupt fear be caught which caus them close volum precipit great danger thu incur they deriv but veri moder amount pleasur most interest thing they found were some unintellig page sin young boy they play alley garden border few shabbi fruit tree spite extrem surveil sever punish administ when wind had shaken tree they sometim succeed pick green appl or spoil apricot or inhabit pear sli i will now cede privileg speech letter which lie me letter written five twenti year ago old pupil now madam la duchess de one most eleg women pari i quot liter one hide one s pear or one s appl as best one may when one goe upstair put veil bed supper one stuff them one s pillow night one eat them bed when one cannot do that one eat them closet that wa one their greatest luxuri onc it wa epoch visit archbishop convent one young girl mademoisel bouchard who wa connect montmor famili laid bouchard indescrib terror her companion step rank said monseigneur day s leav absenc mademoisel bouchard wa tall bloom prettiest littl rosi face world m de quélen smile said what my dear child day s leav absenc three day if you like i grant you three day prioress could do noth archbishop had spoken horror convent but joy pupil effect may be imagin thi stern cloister wa not so well wall off howev but that life passion outsid world drama even romanc did not make their way prove thi we will confin ourselv record here briefli mention real incontest fact which howev bear no refer itself is not connect ani thread whatev stori which we are relat we mention fact sake complet physiognomi convent reader s mind thi time there wa convent mysteri person who wa not nun who wa treat great respect who wa address as _madam albertine_ noth wa known her save that she wa mad that world she pass dead beneath thi histori it wa said there lay arrang fortun necessari great marriag thi woman hardli thirti year age dark complexion toler pretti had vagu look her larg black eye could she see there wa some doubt thi she glide rather than walk she never spoke it wa not quit known she breath her nostril were livid pinch as yield their last sigh touch her hand wa like touch snow she possess strang spectral grace wherev she enter peopl felt cold one day sister see her pass said anoth sister she pass dead woman perhap she is one repli other hundr tale were told madam albertin thi aros etern curios pupil chapel there wa galleri call _l œil de bœuf_ it wa thi galleri which had onli circular bay _œil de bœuf_ that madam albertin listen offic she alway occupi it alon becaus thi galleri be level first stori preacher or offici priest could be seen which wa interdict nun one day pulpit wa occupi young priest high rank m le duc de rohan peer franc offic red musket 1815 when he wa princ de léon who die afterward 1830 as cardin archbishop besançon it wa first time that m de rohan had preach petit picpu convent madam albertin usual preserv perfect calm complet immobl sermon servic that day as soon as she caught sight m de rohan she half rose said loud voic amid silenc chapel ah august whole commun turn their head amaz preacher rais hi eye but madam albertin had relaps her immobl breath outer world flash life had pass instant across that cold lifeless face had then vanish mad woman had becom corps again those two word howev had set everi one convent who had privileg speech chatter how mani thing were contain that ah august what revel m de rohan s name realli wa august it wa evid that madam albertin belong veri highest societi she knew m de rohan that her own rank there wa highest she spoke thu familiarli so great lord that there exist them some connect relationship perhap but child one cannot scale perpendicular wall child one s arm who wa that child where did they both come fauchelev had live convent he had heard noth m sur m he knew noth what had taken place there father madelein had air which discourag question besid fauchelev said himself one doe not question saint m madelein had preserv all hi prestig fauchelev s eye onli some word which jean valjean had let fall garden thought he could draw infer that m madelein had probabl becom bankrupt hard time that he wa pursu hi creditor or that he had compromis himself some polit affair wa hide which last did not displeas fauchelev who like mani our peasant north had old fund bonapart him while hide m madelein had select convent as refug it wa quit simpl that he should wish remain there but inexplic point which fauchelev return constantli which he weari hi brain wa that m madelein should be there that he should have that littl girl him fauchelev saw them touch them spoke them still did not believ it possibl incomprehens had just made it entranc fauchelev s hut fauchelev grope amid conjectur could see noth clearli but thi m madelein save my life thi certainti alon wa suffici decid hi cours he said himself it is my turn now he ad hi conscienc m madelein did not stop deliber when it wa question thrust himself cart purpos drag me he made hi mind save m madelein nevertheless he put mani question himself made himself diver repli what he did me would i save him if he were thief just same if he were assassin would i save him just same he is saint shall i save him just same but what problem it wa manag have him remain convent fauchelev did not recoil face thi almost chimer undertak thi poor peasant picardi ani other ladder than hi self devot hi good will littl that old rustic cun thi occas enlist servic gener enterpris undertook scale difficulti cloister steep escarp rule saint benoît father fauchelev wa old man who had been egoist all hi life who end hi day halt infirm no interest left him world found it sweet be grate perceiv gener action be perform flung himself it like man who moment when he is die should find close hi hand glass good wine which he had never tast should swallow it avid we may add that air which he had breath mani year thi convent had destroy all person him had end render good action some kind absolut necessari him so he took hi resolv devot himself m madelein we have just call him _poor peasant picardy_ that descript is just but incomplet point thi stori which we have now reach littl father fauchelev s physiolog becom use he wa peasant but he had been notari which ad trickeri hi cun penetr hi ingenu have variou caus fail hi busi he had descend call carter labor but spite oath lash which hors seem requir someth notari had linger him he had some natur wit he talk good grammar he convers which is rare thing villag other peasant said him he talk almost like gentleman hat fauchelev belong fact that speci which impertin flippant vocabulari last centuri qualifi as _demi bourgeoi demi lout_ which metaphor shower château thatch cottag ticket pigeon hole plebeian _rather rustic rather citifi pepper salt_ fauchelev though sore tri harshli use fate worn sort poor threadbar old soul wa nevertheless impuls man extrem spontan hi action preciou qualiti which prevent one ever be wick hi defect hi vice he had some were all superfici short hi physiognomi wa kind which succe observ hi age face had none those disagre wrinkl top forehead which signifi malic or stupid daybreak father fauchelev open hi eye have done enorm deal think beheld m madelein seat hi truss straw watch cosett s slumber fauchelev sat said now that you are here how are you go contriv enter thi remark sum situat arous jean valjean hi reveri two men took counsel togeth first place said fauchelev you will begin not set foot outsid thi chamber either you or child one step garden we are done that is true monsieur madelein resum fauchelev you have arriv veri auspici afford cosett joy which we inspir ha thi charm properti that far grow meagr like all reflect it return us more radiant than ever recreat hour jean valjean watch her run play distanc he distinguish her laugh that rest cosett laugh now cosett s face had even undergon chang certain extent gloom had disappear it smile is same as sunshin it banish winter human counten recreat when cosett went hous again jean valjean gaze window her class room night he rose look window her dormitori god ha hi own way moreov convent contribut like cosett uphold complet bishop s work jean valjean it is certain that virtu adjoin pride one side bridg built devil exist there jean valjean had been unconsci perhap toler near that side that bridg when provid cast hi lot convent petit picpu so long as he had compar himself onli bishop he had regard himself as unworthi had remain humbl but some time past he had been compar himself men gener pride wa begin spring who know he might have end return veri gradual hatr convent stop him that downward path thi wa second place captiv which he had seen hi youth what had been him begin hi life later quit recent again he had beheld anoth fright place terribl place whose sever had alway appear him iniqu justic crime law now galley he saw cloister when he medit how he had form part galley that he now so speak wa spectat cloister he confront two hi own mind anxieti sometim he cross hi arm lean hi hoe slowli descend endless spiral reveri he recal hi former companion how wretch they were they rose dawn toil night hardli were they permit sleep they lay camp bed where noth wa toler but mattress two inch thick room which were heat onli veri harshest month year they were cloth fright red blous they were allow as great favor linen trouser hottest weather woollen carter s blous their back when it wa veri cold they drank no wine ate no meat when they went fatigu duti they live nameless design onli number convert manner cipher themselv downcast eye lower voic shorn head beneath cudgel disgrac then hi mind revert be whom he had hi eye these be also live shorn head downcast eye lower voic not disgrac but amid scoff world not their back bruis cudgel but their shoulder lacer their disciplin their name also had vanish men they no longer exist auster appel they never ate meat they never drank wine they often remain even food they were attir not red blous but black shroud woollen which wa heavi summer thin winter power add or subtract anyth it have even accord season resourc linen garment or woollen cloak six month year they wore serg chemis which gave them fever they dwelt not room warm onli rigor cold but cell where no fire wa ever light they slept not mattress two inch thick but straw final they were not even allow their sleep everi night day toil they were oblig weari their first slumber moment when they were fall sound asleep begin get warm rous themselv rise go pray ice cold gloomi chapel their knee stone certain day each these be turn had remain twelv success hour kneel postur or prostrat face pavement arm outstretch form cross other were men these were women what had those men done they had stolen violat pillag murder assassin they were bandit counterfeit poison incendiari murder parricid what had these women done they had done noth whatev one hand highway robberi fraud deceit violenc sensual homicid all sort sacrileg everi varieti crime other one thing onli innoc perfect innoc almost caught heaven mysteri assumpt attach earth virtu alreadi possess someth heaven holi one hand confid crime which are exchang whisper other confess fault made aloud what crime what fault one hand miasm other ineff perfum one hand moral pest guard sight pen rang cannon liter devour it plagu stricken victim other chast flame all soul same hearth there dark here shadow but shadow fill gleam light gleam full radianc two stronghold slaveri but first deliver possibl legal limit alway sight then escap second perpetu sole hope distant extrem futur that faint light liberti which men call death first men are bound onli chain other chain faith what flow first immens curs gnash teeth hatr desper vicious cri rage against human societi sarcasm against heaven what result flow second bless love these two place so similar yet so unlik these two speci be who were so veri unlik were undergo same work expiat jean valjean understood thoroughli expiat former that person expiat expiat one s self but he did not understand that these last that creatur reproach stain he trembl as he ask himself expiat what what expiat voic hi conscienc repli most divin human generos expiat other here all person theori is withheld we are onli narrat we place ourselv jean valjean s point view we translat hi impress hi eye he had sublim summit abneg highest all that etern festiv be thi season our law are wise provid thank them thi blade drip thi shrove tuesday chapter xi scoff reign there is no limit pari no citi ha had that domin which sometim derid those whom it subjug pleas you o athenian exclaim alexand pari make more than law it make fashion pari set more than fashion it set routin pari may be stupid if it see fit it sometim allow itself thi luxuri then univers is stupid compani it then pari awak rub it eye say how stupid i am burst laugh face human race what marvel is such citi it is strang thing that thi grandios thi burlesqu should be amic neighbor that all thi majesti should not be thrown disord all thi parodi that same mouth can day blow trump judgment day morrow reed flute pari ha sovereign jovial it gayeti is thunder it farc smoke it roof form idea univers heap mud stone if you will but all moral be it is more than great it is immens whi becaus it is dare dare that is price progress all sublim conquest are more or less prize dare order that revolut should take place it doe not suffic that montesquieu should forese it that diderot should preach it that beaumarchai should announc it that condorcet should calcul it that arouet should prepar it that rousseau should premedit it it is necessari that danton should dare it cri _audac _ is _fiat lux_ it is necessari sake forward march human race that there should be proud lesson courag perman height dare deed dazzl histori are one man s great sourc light dawn dare when it rise attempt brave persist persever be faith one s self grasp fate bodili astound catastroph year age hi walk wa erect he talk loudli saw clearli drank neat ate slept snore he had all thirti two hi teeth he onli wore spectacl when he read he wa amor disposit but declar that last ten year he terrac charm enclosur full flower which one could say were they much larger these are garden were they littl smaller these are bouquet all these enclosur abut river one end hous other man waistcoat neither peasant nor bourgeois who serv him plot earth which he call hi garden wa celebr town beauti flower which he cultiv there these flower were hi occup dint labor persever attent bucket water he had succeed creat creator he had invent certain tulip certain dahlia which seem have been forgotten natur he wa ingeni he had forestal soulang bodin format littl clump earth heath mould cultiv rare preciou shrub america china he wa hi alley break day summer plant cut hoe water walk amid hi flower air kind sad sweet sometim stand motionless thought hour listen song bird tree babbl child hous or hi eye fix drop dew tip spear grass which sun made carbuncl hi tabl wa veri plain he drank more milk than wine child could make him give way hi servant scold him he wa so timid that he seem shi he rare went he saw no one but poor peopl who tap hi pane hi curé abbé mabeuf good old man nevertheless if inhabit town or stranger or ani chanc comer curiou see hi tulip rang hi littl cottag he open hi door smile he wa brigand loir ani one who had same time read militari memoir biographi _moniteur_ bulletin grand armi would have been struck name which occur there toler frequenc name georg pontmerci when veri young thi georg pontmerci had been soldier saintong s regiment revolut broke saintong s regiment form part armi rhine old regiment monarchi preserv their name provinc even fall monarchi were onli divid brigad 1794 pontmerci fought spire worm neustadt turkheim alzey mayenc where he wa one two hundr who form houchard s rearguard it wa twelfth hold it ground against corp princ hess behind old rampart andernach onli rejoin main bodi armi when enemi s cannon had open breach cord parapet foot glaci he wa kléber marchienn battl mont palissel where ball biscaïen broke hi arm then he pass frontier itali wa one thirti grenadi who defend col de tend joubert joubert wa appoint it adjut gener pontmerci sub lieuten pontmerci wa berthier s side midst grape shot that day lodi which caus bonapart say berthier ha been cannon cavali grenadi he beheld hi old gener joubert fall novi moment when uplift sabr he wa shout forward have been embark hi compani exig campaign board pinnac which wa proceed genoa some obscur port coast he fell wasp nest seven or eight english vessel genoes command want throw hi cannon sea hide soldier deck slip dark as merchant vessel pontmerci had color hoist peak sail proudli past gun british frigat twenti leagu further hi audac have increas he attack hi pinnac captur larg english transport which wa carri troop sicili which wa so load down men hors that vessel wa sunk level sea 1805 he wa that malher divis which took günzberg archduk ferdinand weltingen he receiv hi arm beneath storm bullet colonel maupetit mortal wound head 9th dragoon he distinguish himself austerlitz that admir march echelon effect enemi s fire when cavalri imperi russian guard crush battalion 4th line pontmerci wa one those who took their reveng overthrew guard emperor gave him cross pontmerci saw wurmser mantua méla alexandria mack ulm made prison success he form part eighth corp grand armi which mortier command which captur hamburg then he wa transfer 55th line which wa old regiment flander eylau he wa cemeteri where space two hour heroic captain loui hugo uncl author thi book sustain alon hi compani eighti three men everi effort hostil armi pontmerci wa one three who emerg aliv that cemeteri he wa friedland then he saw moscow then la bérésina then lutzen bautzen dresden wachau leipzig defil gelenhausen then montmirail château thierri craon bank marn bank aisn redoubt posit laon arnay le duc be then captain he put ten cossack sword save not hi gener but hi corpor he wa well slash thi occas twenti seven splinter were extract hi left arm alon eight day capitul pari he had just exchang comrad enter cavalri he had what wa call old regim _the doubl hand_ that is say equal aptitud handl sabr or musket as soldier or squadron or battalion as offic it is thi aptitud perfect militari educ which certain special branch servic aris dragoon exampl who are both cavalri men infantri one same time he accompani napoleon island elba waterloo he wa chief squadron cuirassi duboi brigad it wa he who captur standard lunenburg battalion he came cast flag emperor s feet he wa cover blood while tear down banner he had receiv sword cut across hi face emperor greatli pleas shout him you are colonel you are baron you are offic legion honor pontmerci repli sire i thank you my widow hour later he fell ravin ohain now who wa thi georg pontmerci he wa thi same brigand loir we have alreadi seen someth hi histori waterloo pontmerci who had been pull hollow road ohain as it will be rememb had succeed join armi had drag himself ambul ambul as far as canton loir restor had place him half pay then had sent him resid that is say surveil vernon king loui xviii all that which had taken place hundr day as not have occur all did not recogn hi qualiti as offic legion honor nor hi grade colonel nor hi titl baron he hi side neglect no occas sign himself colonel baron pontmerci he had onli old blue coat he never went fasten it hi rosett as offic legion honor attorney crown had him warn that author would prosecut him illeg wear thi decor when thi notic wa convey him offici intermediari pontmerci retort bitter smile i do not know i no longer understand french or you no longer speak it but fact is that i do not understand then he went eight success day hi rosett they dare not interfer him two or three time minist war gener command depart wrote him follow address _ monsieur le command pontmerci _ he sent back letter seal unbroken same moment napoleon saint helena wa treat same fashion missiv sir hudson low address _gener bonaparte_ pontmerci had end may we be pardon express have hi mouth same saliva as hi emperor same way there were rome carthaginian prison who refus salut flaminiu who had littl hannib s spirit one day he encount district attorney one street vernon step him said mr crown attorney am i permit wear my scar he had noth save hi meagr half pay as chief squadron he had hire smallest hous which he could find vernon he live there alon we have just seen how empir two war he had found time marri mademoisel gillenormand old bourgeoi thoroughli indign bottom had given hi consent sigh say greatest famili are forc it 1815 madam pontmerci admir woman everi sens way lofti sentiment rare worthi her husband die leav child thi child had been colonel s joy hi solitud but grandfath had imper claim hi grandson declar that if child were not given him he would disinherit him father had yield littl one s interest had transfer hi love flower moreov he had renounc everyth neither stir mischief nor conspir he share hi thought innoc thing which he wa then do great thing which he had done he pass hi time expect pink or recal austerlitz m gillenormand kept no relat hi son law colonel wa bandit him m gillenormand never mention colonel when he occasion made mock allus hi baronship it had been expressli agre that pontmerci should never attempt see hi son nor speak him penalti have latter hand him disown disinherit gillenormand pontmerci wa man afflict plagu they intend bring child their own way perhap colonel wa wrong accept these condit but he submit them think that he wa do right sacrif no one but himself inherit father gillenormand did not amount much but inherit mademoisel gillenormand elder wa consider thi aunt who had remain unmarri wa veri rich matern side her sister s son wa her natur heir boy whose name wa mariu knew that he had father but noth more no one open hi mouth him it nevertheless societi which hi grandfath took him whisper innuendo wink had eventu enlighten littl boy s mind he had final understood someth case as he natur took idea opinion which were so speak air he breath sort infiltr slow penetr he gradual came think hi father onli shame pain hi heart while he wa grow thi fashion colonel slip away everi two or three month came pari sli like crimin break hi ban went post himself saint sulpic hour when aunt gillenormand led mariu mass there trembl lest comprehend hi father he had not known either one or other sort voluntari night had obscur hi eye now he saw one hand he admir while other he ador he wa fill regret remors he reflect despair that all routin should end convert our colleg artifici oyster bed he wa learn purist exact graduat polytechn close student same time thought even chimæra so hi friend said he believ all dream railroad suppress suffer chirurg oper fix imag dark chamber electr telegraph steer balloon moreov he wa not much alarm citadel erect against human mind everi direct superstit despot prejudic he wa one those who think that scienc will eventu turn posit enjolra wa chief combeferr wa guid one would have like fight one march behind other it is not that combeferr wa not capabl fight he did not refus hand hand combat obstacl attack it main forc explos but it suit him better bring human race accord it destini gradual mean educ inculc axiom promulg posit law two light hi prefer wa rather illumin than conflagr conflagr can creat aurora no doubt but whi not await dawn volcano illumin but daybreak furnish still better illumin possibl combeferr prefer white beauti blaze sublim light troubl smoke progress purchas expens violenc onli half satisfi thi tender seriou spirit headlong precipit peopl truth 93 terrifi him nevertheless stagnat wa still more repuls him it he detect putrefact death whole he prefer scum miasma he prefer torrent cesspool fall niagara lake montfaucon short he desir neither halt nor hast while hi tumultu friend captiv absolut ador invok splendid revolutionari adventur combeferr wa inclin let progress good progress take it own cours he may have been cold but he wa pure method but irreproach phlegmat but imperturb combeferr would have knelt clasp hi hand enabl futur arriv all it candor that noth might disturb immens virtuou evolut race _the good must be innocent_ he repeat incessantli fact if grandeur revolut consist keep dazzl ideal fixedli view soar thither athwart lightn fire blood it talon beauti progress lie be spotless there exist washington who repres one danton who incarn other that differ which separ swan angel wing eagl jean prouvair wa still softer shade than combeferr hi name wa jehan owe that petti momentari freak which mingl power profound movement whenc sprang veri essenti studi middl age jean prouvair wa love he cultiv pot flower play flute made vers love peopl piti woman wept child confound god futur same confid blame revolut have caus fall royal head that andré chénier hi voic wa ordinarili delic but suddenli grew manli he wa learn even erudit almost orientalist all he wa good veri simpl thing those who know how nearli good border grandeur matter poetri he prefer immens he knew italian latin greek hebrew these serv him onli perus four poet dant juven æschylu isaiah french he prefer corneil racin agrippa d aubigné corneil he love saunter field wild oat corn flower busi himself cloud nearli as much as event hi mind transit soften passag deaden shock caus nation pass insens monarchi democraci practic constitut fiction what detest reason all those are no no let us never enlighten peopl fals daylight principl dwindl pale your constitut cellar no illegitimaci no compromis no grant king peopl all such grant there is articl 14 side hand which give there is claw which snatch back i refus your charter point forbid that i should diminish franc but amalgam napoleon her is not diminish her come let us argu question i am newcom you but i will confess that you amaz me where do we stand who are we who are you who am i let us come explan emperor i hear you say _buonaparte_ accent _u_ like royalist i warn you that my grandfath doe better still he say _buonaparté_ i thought you were young men where then is your enthusiasm what are you do it whom do you admir if you do not admir emperor what more do you want if you will have none that great man what great men would you like he had everyth he wa complet he had hi brain sum human faculti he made code like justinian he dictat like cæsar hi convers wa mingl lightn flash pascal thunderclap tacitu he made histori he wrote it hi bulletin are iliad he combin cipher newton metaphor mahomet he left behind him east word as great as pyramid tilsit he taught emperor majesti academi scienc he repli laplac council state he held hi own against merlin he gave soul geometri first chicaneri last he wa legist attorney sider astronom like cromwel blow one two candl he went templ bargain curtain tassel he saw everyth he knew everyth which did not prevent indiffer heedless trampl foot encyclopedia last centuri wa mine that wa almost open sky shade those sombr hatcher primit christian onli await opportun bring explos cæsar inund human race light sacr thi is it disinterested marat forget himself like jesu they throw themselv one side they omit themselv they think not themselv they have glanc that glanc seek absolut first ha whole heaven hi eye last who ha no glanc all social order ha it black miner there is point where depth is tantamount burial where light becom extinct all these mine which we have just mention all these galleri thi whole immens subterranean venou system progress utopia much further earth much lower than marat lower than babeuf lower much lower ani connect upper level there lie last mine formid spot thi is what we have seek fumbl gnaw social ugolino is thi gulf wild spectr who roam thi grave almost beast almost phantom are not occupi univers progress they are ignor both idea word they take no thought anyth but are brutal voraci that is say feroci not fashion tyrant but fashion tiger suffer these spectr pass crime fatal affili dizzi creation logic dark that which crawl social third lower level is no longer children he had lost them as one lose hi handkerchief babet read paper strike except world which he belong one day period when he had hi famili him hi booth wheel he had read _messager_ that woman had just given birth child who wa do well had calf s muzzl he exclaim there s fortun my wife ha not wit present me child like that later he had abandon everyth order undertak pari thi wa hi express who wa he appear it wa as though he sprang earth lugubri be wa montparnass montparnass wa child less than twenti year age handsom face lip like cherri charm black hair brilliant light springtim hi eye he had sort proteu wind like serpent polic strive escap vidocq s indiscreet glanc diver form tree flame fountain lend each other their name their trap hide their own shadow box secret compart refug each other strip off their person as one remov hi fals nose mask ball sometim simplifi matter point consist but one individu sometim multipli themselv such point that coco latour himself took them whole throng these four men were not four men they were sort mysteri robber four head oper grand scale pari they were that monstrou polyp evil which inhabit crypt societi thank their ramif network underli their relat babet gueulem claques montparnass were charg gener enterpris ambush depart sein inventor idea that natur men nocturn imagin appli them have their idea execut they furnish canva four rascal latter undertook prepar sceneri they labor stage set they were alway condit lend forc proport suitabl all crime which demand lift shoulder which were suffici lucr when crime wa quest arm they let their accomplic they kept troup actor shadow disposit all underground tragedi they were habit assembl nightfal hour when they woke plain which adjoin salpêtrièr there they held their confer they had twelv black hour them they regul their employ accordingli _patron minette_ such wa name which wa bestow subterranean circul associ these four men fantast ancient popular parlanc which is vanish day day _patron minette_ signifi morn same as _entr chien et loup_ dog wolf signifi even thi appel _patron minette_ wa probabl deriv hour which their work end dawn be vanish moment phantom separ ruffian night which they pass they went off day sleep sometim lime kiln sometim abandon quarri montmatr or montroug sometim sewer they ran earth what becam these men they still exist they have alway exist horac speak them _ambubaiarum collegia pharmacopolæ mendici mimæ_ so long as societi remain what it is they will remain what they are beneath obscur roof their cavern they are continu born again social ooz they return spectr but alway ident onli they no longer bear same name they are no longer same skin individu extirp tribe subsist they alway have same faculti vagrant tramp race is maintain it puriti they divin purs pocket they scent watch fob gold silver possess odor them there exist ingenu bourgeoi whom it might be said that they have stealabl air these men patient pursu these bourgeoi they experi quiver spider passag stranger or man countri these men are terribl when one encount them or catch glimps them midnight desert boulevard they do not seem be men but form compos live mist one would say that they habitu constitut one mass shadow that they are no wise distinct them that they possess no other soul than dark that it is onli momentarili purpos live few minut monstrou life that they have separ night what is necessari caus these spectr vanish light light flood not singl bat can resist dawn light societi book eighth wick poor man chapter i mariu while seek girl bonnet what mariu read it madam la comtess it is unhappi mother famili six children last which is onli eight month old i sick my last confin abandon my husband five month ago have no resourc world most fright indig hope madam la comtess she ha honor be madam profound respect mistress balizard mariu turn third letter which wa petit like preced he read monsieur pabourgeot elector wholesal stock merchant rue saint deni corner rue aux fer i permit myself address you thi letter beg you grant me pretiou favor your simpati interest yourself man letter who ha just sent drama théâtre françai subject is histor action take place auvergn time empir style i think is natur lacon may have some merit there are couplet be sung four place comic seriou unexpect are mingl varieti charact ting romantic lightli spread all intrigu which proce misteri end strike altar midst mani beauti stroke brilliant scene my princip object is satisfi desir which progress anim man our centuri that is say which newcom are treat monsiuer pabourgeot your just reput as enlighten protector men litter embolden me send you my daughter who will explain our indig situat you lack bread fire thi wynter season when i say you that i beg you accept dedic my drama which i desir make you all those that i shall make is prove you how great is my ambit have honor shelter myself your protect adorn my write your name if you deign honor me most modest offer i shall immedi occupi myself make piess vers pay you my tribut gratitud which i shall endeavor render thi piess as perfect as possibl will be sent you it is insert begin drama deliv stage monsieur madam pabourgeot my most respect complement genflot man letter p s even if it is onli forti sou excus me send my daughter not present myself but sad motiv connect toilet do not permit me ala go final mariu open fourth letter address ran _to benevol gentleman church saint jacqu du haut pas_ it contain follow line benevol man if you deign accompani my daughter you will behold misser calam i will show you my certif aspect these write your gener soul will be move sentiment obviou benevol true philosoph alway feel live emot admit compassion man that end volum iii mariu volum iv saint deni illustr frontispiec volum four illustr titlepag volum four idyl rue plumet epic rue saint deni book first few page histori chapter i well cut 1831 1832 two year which are immedi connect revolut juli form one most peculiar strike moment histori these two year rise like two mountain midway those which preced those which follow them they have revolutionari grandeur precipic are be distinguish there social mass veri assiz civil solid group superpos adher interest centuri old profil ancient french format appear disappear them everi instant athwart storm cloud system passion theori these appear disappear have been design as movement resist interv truth that daylight human soul can be descri shine there thi remark epoch is decidedli circumscrib is begin be suffici distant us allow our grasp princip line even present day we shall make attempt restor had been one those intermedi phase hard defin which there is fatigu buzz murmur sleep tumult which are noth els than arriv great nation halt place these epoch are peculiar mislead politician who desir convert them profit begin nation ask noth but repos it thirst but one thing peac it ha but one ambit be small which is translat remain tranquil great event great hazard great adventur great men thank god we have seen enough we have them heap higher than our head we would exchang cæsar that when javert return cours morn purpos question mariu as event preced even he found onli ma am bougon who answer move away ma am bougon wa convinc that mariu wa some extent accomplic robber who had been seiz night who would ever have said it she exclaim portress quarter young man like that who had air girl mariu had two reason thi prompt chang resid first wa that he now had horror that hous where he had beheld so close hand it most repuls most feroci develop social deform which is perhap even more terribl than wick rich man wick poor man second wa that he did not wish figur lawsuit which would insu all probabl be brought testifi against thénardier javert thought that young man whose name he had forgotten wa afraid had fled or perhap had not even return home time ambush he made some effort find him howev but success month pass then anoth mariu wa still courfeyrac he had learn young licenti law habitu frequent court that thénardier wa close confin everi monday mariu had five franc hand clerk s offic la forc thénardier as mariu had no longer ani money he borrow five franc courfeyrac it wa first time hi life that he had ever borrow money these period five franc were doubl riddl courfeyrac who lent thénardier who receiv them whom can they go thought courfeyrac whenc can thi come me thénardier ask himself moreov mariu wa heart broken everyth had plung trap door onc more he no longer saw anyth him hi life wa again buri mysteri where he wander fumblingli he had moment beheld veri close hand that obscur young girl whom he love old man who seem be her father those unknown be who were hi onli interest hi onli hope thi world veri moment when he thought himself point grasp them gust had swept all these shadow away not spark certainti truth had been emit even most terribl collis no conjectur wa possibl he no longer knew even name that he thought he knew it certainli wa not ursul lark wa nicknam what wa he think old man wa he actual hide polic white hair workman whom mariu had encount vicin invalid recur hi mind it now seem probabl that that workingman m leblanc were one same person so he disguis himself that man had hi heroic hi equivoc side whi had he not call help whi had he fled wa he or wa he not father young girl wa he short man whom thénardier thought that he recogn thénardier might have been mistaken these form so mani insolubl problem all thi it is true detract noth angel charm young girl luxembourg heart rend distress mariu bore passion hi heart night hi eye he wa thrust onward he wa drawn he could not stir all had vanish save love love itself he had lost instinct sudden illumin ordinarili thi flame which burn us light us also littl cast some use gleam but mariu no longer even heard these mute counsel passion he never said himself what if i were go such place what if i were tri such such thing girl whom he could no longer call ursul wa evid somewher noth warn mariu what direct he should seek her hi whole life wa now sum two word absolut uncertainti impenetr fog see her onc again he still aspir thi but he no longer expect it crown all hi poverti had return he felt that ici breath close him hi heel midst hi torment long thi he had discontinu hi work noth is more danger than discontinu work it is habit which vanish habit which is easi get rid difficult take again certain amount dream is good like narcot discreet dose it lull sleep fever mind labor which are sometim sever produc spirit soft fresh vapor which correct harsh contour pure thought fill gap here there bind togeth round off angl idea but too much dream sink drown woe brain worker who allow himself fall entir thought reveri he think that he can re ascend equal eas he tell himself that all it is same thing error thought is toil intellig reveri it voluptu replac thought reveri is confound poison food mariu had begun that way as reader will rememb passion had superven had finish work precipit him chimæra object or bottom one no longer emerg one s self purpos go off dream idl product tumultu stagnant gulf proport as labor diminish need increas thi is law man state reveri is gener prodig slack unstrung mind cannot hold life close bound there is that mode life good mingl evil if enerv is bale generos is good health but poor man who is gener nobl who doe not work is lost resourc are exhaust need crop fatal decliv down which most honest firmest as well as most feebl most viciou are drawn which end one two hold suicid or crime dint go outdoor think day come when one goe throw one s self water excess reveri breed men like escouss lebra mariu wa descend thi decliv slow pace hi eye fix girl whom he no longer saw what we have just written seem strang yet it is true memori absent be kindl dark heart more it ha disappear more it beam gloomi despair soul see thi light it horizon star inner night she that wa mariu whole thought he medit noth els he wa confusedli consciou that hi old coat wa becom imposs coat that hi new coat wa grow old that hi shirt were wear that hi hat wa wear that hi boot were give he said himself if i could but see her onc again i die one sweet idea alon wa left him that she had love him that her glanc had told him so that she did not know hi name but that she did know hi soul that wherev she wa howev mysteri place she still love him perhap who know she were not think him as he wa think her sometim those inexplic hour such as are experienc everi heart that love though he had no reason anyth but sad yet felt obscur quiver joy he said himself it is her thought that are come me then he ad perhap my thought reach her also thi illus which he shook hi head moment later wa suffici nevertheless throw beam which time resembl hope hi soul time time especi that even hour which is most depress even dreami he allow purest most imperson most ideal reveri which fill hi brain fall notebook which contain noth els he call thi write her it must not be suppos that hi reason wa derang quit contrari he had lost faculti work move firmli ani fix goal but he wa endow more clear sighted rectitud than ever mariu survey calm real although peculiar light what pass hi eye even most indiffer deed men he pronounc just critic everyth sort honest deject candid disinterested hi judgment which wa almost wholli disassoci hope held itself aloof soar high thi state mind noth escap him noth deceiv him everi moment he wa discov foundat life human destini happi even midst anguish is he whom god ha given soul worthi love unhappi he who ha not view thing thi world heart man thi doubl light ha seen noth know noth true soul which love suffer is state sublim howev day follow day noth new present itself it mere seem him that sombr space which still remain be travers him wa grow shorter everi instant he thought that he alreadi distinctli perceiv brink bottomless abyss what he repeat himself shall i not see her again then when you have ascend rue saint jacqu left barrier one side follow old inner passer mariu vagu impress almost savag beauti place ask thi passer what is name thi spot person repli it is lark s meadow he ad it wa here that ulbach kill shepherdess ivri but word lark mariu heard lark chapter ii embryon format crime incub prison javert s triumph gorbeau hovel seem complet but had not been so first place thi constitut princip anxieti javert had not taken prison prison assassin man who flee is more suspici than assassin it is probabl that thi personag who had been so preciou captur ruffian would be no less fine prize author then montparnass had escap javert anoth opportun winter we shall have no wood there is sun butcher refus give credit he will not let us have ani more meat that is quit right i do not digest meat well it is too heavi what shall we have dinner bread look steadili montparnass he address him gentl voic midst dark where they stood solemn harangu which gavroch did not lose singl syllabl my child you are enter indol one most labori live ah you declar yourself be idler prepar toil there is certain formid machin have you seen it it is roll mill you must be your guard against it it is crafti feroci if it catch hold skirt your coat you will be drawn bodili that machin is lazi stop while there is yet time save yourself otherwis it is all you short time you will be gear onc entangl hope noth more toil lazybon there is no more repos you iron hand implac toil ha seiz you you do not wish earn your live have task fulfil duti it bore you be like other men well you will be differ labor is law he who reject it will find ennui hi torment you do not wish be workingman you will be slave toil let go you one side onli grasp you again other you do not desir be it friend you shall be it negro slave ah you would have none honest weari men you shall have sweat damn where other sing you will rattl your throat you will see afar off other men work it will seem you that they are rest labor harvest sailor blacksmith will appear you glori like bless spirit paradis what radianc surround forg guid plough bind sheav is joy bark liberti wind what delight do you lazi idler delv drag roll march drag your halter you are beast burden team hell ah do noth is your object well not week not day not hour shall you have free oppress you will be abl lift noth anguish everi minut that pass will make your muscl crack what is feather other will be rock you than there will becom problem that must be solv ani one who want go simpli give hi door push there he is open air if you wish go you will be oblig pierc your wall what doe everi one who want step street do he goe downstair you will tear your sheet littl littl you will make them rope then you will climb your window you will suspend yourself that thread abyss it will be night amid storm rain hurrican if rope is too short but one way descend will remain you fall drop hap hazard gulf unknown height what what is beneath unknown or you will crawl chimney flue risk burn or you will creep sewer hi pocket key made locksmith if you wish pass you will be condemn execut terribl work art you will take larg sou you will cut it two plate what tool you will have invent them that is your busi then you will hollow interior these plate take great care outsid you will make edg thread so that they can be adjust one other like box it cover top bottom thu screw togeth noth will be suspect overs it will be onli sou you it will be box what will you put thi box small bit steel watch spring which you will have cut teeth which will form saw thi saw as long as pin conceal sou you will cut bolt lock becom known that you are author dungeon there is your futur what precipic are idl pleasur do you know that do noth is melancholi resolut live idl properti societi be useless that is say pernici thi lead straight depth wretched woe man who desir be parasit he will becom vermin ah so it doe not pleas you work ah you have but one thought drink well eat well sleep well you will drink water you will brushwood you will eat grass like beast forest you will be recaptur then you will pass year dungeon rivet wall grope your jug that you may drink gnaw horribl loaf dark which dog would not touch eat bean that worm have eaten you you will be wood lous cellar ah have piti yourself you miser young child who were suck nurs less than twenti year ago who have no doubt mother still aliv i conjur you resembl tendril vine which cling as chanc direct capit marbl column or post wine shop rapid decis moment critic everi orphan be she rich or poor wealth doe not prevent bad choic misalli are made veri or whom etymolog analog deriv solitari barbar sometim hideou word which time possess singular power express which live execution _le taule_ forest _le sabri_ fear flight _taf_ lackey _le larbin_ miner place metaphor peculiar languag which is desir say all yet conceal all is that it is rich figur metaphor is enigma wherein thief who is plot stroke prison who is arrang escap take refug no idiom is more metaphor than slang _dévisser le coco_ unscrew nut twist neck _tortiller_ wriggl eat _être gerbé_ be tri _a rat_ bread thief _il lansquine_ it rain strike ancient figur which partli bear it date it which assimil long obliqu line rain dens slant pike lancer which compress singl word popular express it rain halberd sometim proport as slang progress first epoch second word pass primit savag sens metaphor sens devil ceas be _le rabouin_ becom _le boulanger_ baker who put bread oven thi is more witti but less grand someth like racin corneil like euripid æschylu certain slang phrase which particip two epoch have onc barbar charact metaphor charact resembl phantasmagori _le sorgueuer vont sollicit de gail à la lune_ prowler are go steal hors night thi pass mind like group spectr one know not what one see third place expedi slang live languag it use it accord it fanci it dip it hap hazard it often confin itself when occas aris alter it gross summari fashion occasion ordinari word thu deform complic word pure slang picturesqu phrase are form which there can be felt mixtur two preced element direct creation metaphor _le cab jaspin je marronn que la roulott de pantin trime dan le sabri_ dog is bark i suspect that dilig pari is pass wood _le dab est sinv la dabug est merloussièr la fée est bative_ bourgeoi is stupid bourgeois is cun daughter is pretti gener throw listen off one which shed most light ala most dark god will that cosett s love should encount one love which save whole month may that year 1832 there were there everi night that poor neglect garden beneath that turn their peg cosett s whole person wa ingenu ingenu transpar white candor radianc it might have been said cosett that she wa clear she produc those who saw her sensat april dawn there wa dew her eye delic say her prattl wa convers she never made mistak anyth she saw thing justli woman feel speak tender instinct heart which is infal no one understand so well as woman how say thing that are onc both sweet deep sweet depth they are whole woman them lie whole heaven thi full felic tear well their eye everi instant crush ladi bug feather fallen nest branch hawthorn broken arous their piti their ecstasi sweetli mingl melancholi seem ask noth better than weep most sovereign symptom love is tender that is time almost unbear addit thi all these contradict are lightn play love they were fond laugh they laugh readili delici freedom so familiarli that they sometim present air two boy still though unknown heart intox puriti natur is alway present will not be forgotten she is there her brutal sublim object howev great may be innoc soul one feel most modest privat interview ador mysteri shade which separ coupl lover pair friend they idol each other perman immut are persist peopl live they smile they laugh they make littl grimac tip their lip they interlac their finger they call each other _thou_ that doe not prevent etern two lover hide themselv even twilight invis bird rose they fascin each other dark their heart which they throw their eye they murmur they whisper meantim immens librat planet fill infinit univers chapter ii bewilder perfect happi they exist vagu frighten their happi they did not notic cholera which decim pari precis that veri month they had confid each other as far as possibl but thi had not extend much further than their name mariu had told cosett that he wa orphan that hi name wa mariu pontmerci that he wa lawyer that he live write thing publish that hi father had been colonel that latter had been hero that he mariu wa bad term hi grandfath who wa rich he had also hint be baron but thi had produc no effect cosett she did not know mean word mariu wa mariu her side she had confid him that she had been brought petit picpu convent that her mother like hi own wa dead that her father s name wa m fauchelev that he wa veri good that he gave great deal poor but that he wa poor himself that he deni himself everyth though he deni her noth strang say sort symphoni which mariu had live he had been habit see cosett past even most recent past had becom so confus distant him that what cosett told him satisfi him complet it did not even occur him tell her nocturn adventur hovel thénardier burn strang attitud singular flight her father mariu had momentarili forgotten all thi even he did not even know that there had been morn what he had done where he had breakfast nor who had spoken him he had song hi ear which render him deaf everi other thought he onli exist hour when he saw cosett then as he wa heaven it wa quit natur that he heart he wa explain himself that there wa no longer ani reason whi mariu should return that if he intend return he should have done it long ago that he must renounc idea he wa tri accustom himself head had fallen hi breast he fix melancholi irrit gaze ash hi hearth veri midst hi reveri hi old servant basqu enter inquir can monsieur receiv m mariu old man sat erect pallid like corps which rise influenc galvan shock all hi blood had retreat hi heart he stammer m mariu what i don t know repli basqu intimid put counten hi master s air i have not seen him nicolett came said me there s young man here say that it is m mariu father gillenormand stammer low voic show him he remain same attitud shake head hi eye fix door it open onc more young man enter it wa mariu mariu halt door as though wait bright as when one is presenc apparit he wa point swoon he saw mariu dazzl light it certainli wa he it certainli wa mariu last laps four year he grasp him entir so speak singl glanc he found him nobl handsom distinguish well grown complet man suitabl mien charm air he felt desir open hi arm call him fling himself forward hi heart melt raptur affection word swell overflow hi breast length all hi youth demand piti old man nineti one you are enter life i am leav it you go play ball café billiard hall you have wit you pleas women you are handsom fellow as me i spit my brand heart summer you are you jest courthous messieur lawyer i sincer compliment you you are droll octogenarian went grave angri voic come now what do you want me sir said mariu i know that my presenc is displeas you but i have come mere ask one thing you then i shall go away immedi you are fool said old man who said that you were go away thi wa translat tender word which lay bottom hi heart ask my pardon throw yourself straightway convert wrath it increas hi harsh he would have like have mariu understand mariu did not understand which made goodman furiou he began again what you desert me your grandfath you left my spade back repli most unconcern tone it is riot what riot ye they are fight whi are they fight ah good heaven ejacul garden what direct went m mabeuf neighborhood arsen father mabeuf went hi room took hi hat mechan sought book place hi arm found none said ah truli went off bewild air book tenth 5th june 1832 chapter i surfac question what is revolt compos noth everyth electr disengag littl littl flame suddenli dart forth wander forc pass breath thi breath encount head which speak brain which dream soul which suffer passion which burn wretched which howl bear them away whither random athwart state law athwart prosper insol other irrit convict embitt enthusiasm agit indign instinct war which have been repress youth courag which ha been exalt gener blind curios tast chang thirst unexpect sentiment which caus one take pleasur read poster new play love prompter s whistl theatr vagu hatr rancor disappoint everi vaniti which think that destini ha bankrupt it discomfort empti dream ambit that are hedg whoever hope downfal some outcom short veri bottom rabbl that mud which catch fire such are element revolt that which is grandest that which is basest be who prowl outsid all bound await occas bohemian vagrant vagabond crossroad those who sleep night desert hous no other roof than cold cloud heaven those who each day demand their bread chanc not toil unknown poverti nothing bare arm bare foot belong revolt whoever cherish hi soul secret revolt against ani deed whatev part state life or fate is ripe riot as soon as it make it appear he begin quiver feel himself born away whirlwind revolt is sort waterspout social atmospher which form suddenli certain condit temperatur which as it eddi mount descend thunder tear raze crush demolish uproot bear it great natur small strong man feebl mind tree trunk stalk straw woe him whom it bear away as well as him whom it strike it break one against other it commun those whom it seiz indescrib extraordinari power it fill firstcom forc event it convert everyth projectil it make cannon ball rough stone gener porter if we are believ certain oracl crafti polit view littl revolt is desir point view power system revolt strengthen those govern which it doe not overthrow it put armi test it consecr bourgeoisi it draw muscl polic it demonstr forc social framework it is exercis gymnast it is almost hygien power is better health revolt as man is good rub down revolt thirti year ago wa regard still other point view there is everyth theori which proclaim itself good sens philintu against alcesti mediat offer fals true explan admonit rather haughti extenu which becaus it is mingl blame excus think itself wisdom is often onli pedantri whole polit school call golden mean ha been outcom thi as cold water hot water it is lukewarm water parti thi school it fals depth all surfac which dissect effect go back first caus chide it height demi scienc agit public squar if we listen thi school riot which complic affair 1830 depriv that great event portion it puriti revolut juli had been fine popular gale abruptli follow blue sky they made cloudi sky reappear they caus that revolut first so remark it unanim degener quarrel revolut juli as all progress accomplish fit start there had been secret fractur these riot render them percept it might have been said ah thi is broken revolut juli one wa sensibl onli deliver riot one wa consciou catastroph all revolt close shop depress fund throw exchang constern suspend commerc clog busi precipit failur no more money privat fortun render uneasi public credit shaken industri disconcert capit withdraw work discount fear everywher counter shock everi town henc gulf it ha been calcul that first day riot cost franc twenti million second day forti third sixti three day upris cost one hundr twenti million that is say if onli financi result be taken consider it is equival disast shipwreck or lost battl which should annihil fleet sixti ship line no doubt histor upris have their beauti war pavement is no less grandios no less pathet than war thicket one there is soul forest other heart citi one ha jean chouan other ha jeann revolt have illumin red glare all most origin point parisian charact generos devot stormi gayeti student prove that braveri form part intellig nation guard invinc bivouac shopkeep fortress street urchin contempt death part passer school legion clash togeth all combat there wa onli differ age race is same it is same stoical men who die age twenti their idea forti their famili armi alway sad thing civil war oppos prudenc audac upris while prove popular intrepid also educ courag bourgeoi thi is well but is all thi worth bloodsh bloodsh add futur dark progress compromis uneasi best men honest liber despair foreign absolut happi these wound dealt revolut it own hand vanquish 1830 triumph say we told you so add pari enlarg possibl but franc most assuredli diminish add all must need be told massacr which have too often dishonor victori order grown feroci liberti gone mad sum all upris have been disastr thu speak that approxim wisdom which bourgeoisi that approxim peopl so willingli content itself our part we reject thi word _uprisings_ as too larg consequ as too conveni we make distinct one popular movement anoth popular movement we do not inquir upris cost as much as battl whi battl first place here question war come is war less scourg than upris is calam then are all upris calam what if revolt juli did cost hundr twenti million establish philip v spain cost franc two milliard even same price we should prefer 14th juli howev we reject these figur which appear be reason which are onli word upris be given we examin it itself all that is said doctrinarian object present there is no question anyth but effect we seek caus we will be explicit chapter ii root matter there is such thing as upris there is such thing as insurrect these are two separ phase wrath one is wrong other is right democrat state onli one which are found justic it sometim happen that fraction usurp then whole rise necessari claim it right may proceed as far as resort arm all question which result collect sovereignti war whole against fraction is insurrect attack fraction against whole is revolt accord as tuileri contain king or convent they are justli or unjustli attack same cannon point against populac is wrong 10th august right 14th vendémiair alik appear fundament differ realiti swiss defend fals bonapart defend true that which univers suffrag ha effect it liberti it sovereignti cannot be undon street it is same thing pertain pure civil instinct mass clear sight day may be troubl morrow same furi legitim when direct against terray absurd when direct against turgot destruct machin pillag warehous break rail demolit dock fals rout multitud refus peopl justic progress ramu assassin student rousseau driven switzerland stone that is revolt israel against mose athen against phocian rome against cicero that is upris pari against bastil that is insurrect soldier against alexand sailor against christoph columbu thi is same revolt impiou revolt whi becaus alexand is do asia sword that which christoph columbu is do america compass alexand like columbu is find world these gift world civil are such augment light that all resist that case is culpabl sometim populac counterfeit fidel itself mass are traitor peopl is cathol upris sound right movement is recogniz it doe not alway proceed trembl excit mass there are mad rage there are crack bell all tocsin do not give sound bronz brawl passion ignor is quit anoth thing shock progress show me what direct you are go rise if you will but let it be that you may grow great there is no insurrect forward direct ani other sort rise is bad everi violent step rear is revolt retreat is commit deed violenc against human race insurrect is fit rage part truth pavement which upris disturb give forth spark right these pavement bequeath upris onli their mud danton against loui xiv is insurrect hébert against danton is revolt henc it result that if insurrect given case may be as lafayett say most holi duti upris may be most fatal crime there is also differ intens heat insurrect is often volcano revolt is often onli fire straw revolt as we have said is sometim found those power polignac is rioter camil desmoulin is one govern power insurrect is sometim resurrect solut everyth univers suffrag be absolut modern fact all histori anterior thi fact be space four thousand year fill violat right suffer peopl each epoch histori bring it that protest which it is capabl cæsar there wa no insurrect but there wa juven _facit indignatio_ replac gracchi cæsar there is exil syen there is also man _annales_ we do not speak immens exil patmo who hi part also is jew it is hebrew but man who write _annales_ is latin race let us rather say he is roman as nero reign black way they should be paint match work grave tool alon would be too pale there must be pour who when he set centuri stage regul entranc exit cæsar is great tacitu is great god spare these two great not allow them clash one anoth guardian justic strike cæsar might strike too hard be unjust formid historian spare cæsar tacitu accord extenu circumst geniu certainli despot remain despot even despot geniu there is corrupt all illustri tyrant but moral pest is still more hideou infam tyrant is deform base correspond repuls tyrant villaini slave is direct product despot miasma exhal these cower conscienc wherein master is reflect public power are unclean heart are small conscienc are dull who see it onli upris never refer it otherwis than respect them it is like relic 1830 excit imagin say they are not be calm day revolut cannot be cut off short it must need undergo some undul it return state rest like mountain sink plain there are no alp their jura nor pyrene asturia thi pathet crisi contemporari histori which memori parisian call epoch riot is certainli characterist hour amid stormi hour thi centuri last word we enter recit fact which we are relat belong that dramat live realiti which historian sometim neglect lack time space there nevertheless we insist it is life
