not see them again ten or twelv week had elaps that night more than onc he had scratch back hi head said where devil are my two children meantim he had arriv pistol hand rue du pont aux choux he notic that there wa but one shop open that street matter worthi reflect that wa pastri cook s shop thi present providenti occas eat anoth appl turnov enter unknown gavroch halt fumbl hi fob turn hi pocket insid found noth not even sou began shout help it is hard miss last cake nevertheless gavroch pursu hi way two minut later he wa rue saint loui while travers rue du parc royal he felt call make good loss appl turnov which had been imposs he indulg himself immens delight tear down theatr poster broad daylight littl further catch sight group comfort look person who seem be land proprietor he shrug hi shoulder spit random him thi mouth philosoph bile as they pass how fat those money men are they re drunk they just wallow good dinner ask em what they do their money they don t know they eat it that s what they do as much as their belli will hold chapter ii gavroch march brandish triggerless pistol grasp one s hand open street is so much public function that gavroch felt hi fervor increas everi moment amid scrap marseillais which he wa sing he shout all goe well i suffer great deal my left paw i m all broken rheumat but i m satisfi citizen all that bourgeoi have do is bear themselv well i ll sneez them subvers couplet what are polic spi dog i d just like have one them end my pistol i m just boulevard my friend it s get hot there it s get littl boil it s simmer it s time skim pot i am discont here it is 4th june it is almost night ever thi morn i have been wait daylight come it ha not come i bet that it won t come all day thi is inexact ill paid clerk ye everyth is badli horribl he kill therefor i kill him i had do it becaus insurrect must have it disciplin assassin is even more crime here than elsewher we are eye revolut we are priest republ we are victim duti must not be possibl slander our combat i have therefor tri that man condemn him death as myself constrain as i am do what i have done yet abhor it i have judg myself also you shall soon see what i have condemn myself those who listen him shudder we will share thi fate cri combeferr so be it repli enjolra one word more execut thi man i have obey necess but necess is monster old world necess s name is fatal now law progress is that monster shall disappear angel that fatal shall vanish fratern it is bad moment pronounc word love no matter i do pronounc it i glorifi it love futur is thine death i make use thee but i hate thee citizen futur there will be neither dark nor thunderbolt neither feroci ignor nor bloodi retali as there will be no more satan there will be no more michael futur no one will kill ani one els earth will beam radianc human race will love day will come citizen when all will be concord harmoni light joy life it will come it is order that it may come that we are die down your arm fire repli enjolra two discharg took place same moment all disappear smoke acrid stifl smoke which die wound lay weak dull groan when smoke clear away combat both side could be seen be thin but still same posit reload silenc all onc thunder voic wa heard shout be off you or i ll blow barricad all turn direct whenc voic proceed mariu had enter tap room had seiz barrel powder then he had taken advantag smoke sort obscur mist which fill entrench enclosur glide barricad as far as that cage pave stone where torch wa fix tear it torch replac it barrel powder thrust pile stone barrel which wa instantli stave sort horribl obedi all thi had cost mariu but time necessari stoop rise again now all nation guard municip guard offic soldier huddl other extrem barricad gaze stupidli him as he stood hi foot stone hi torch hi hand hi haughti face illumin fatal resolut droop flame torch that redoubt pile where they could make broken barrel powder give vent that startl cri be off you or i longer ani one barrier assail abandon their dead wound flow back pell mell disord extrem street there were again lost night it wa headlong flight barricad wa free chapter v end vers jean prouvair all flock around mariu courfeyrac flung himself hi neck here you are what luck said combeferr you came opportun ejacul bossuet if it had not been you i should have been dead began courfeyrac again if it had not been you i should have been gobbl ad gavroch mariu ask where is chief you are he said enjolra mariu had had furnac hi brain all day long now it wa whirlwind thi whirlwind which wa him produc him effect be outsid him bear him away it seem him that he wa alreadi immens distanc life hi two lumin month joy love end abruptli that fright precipic cosett lost him that barricad m mabeuf get himself kill republ himself leader insurg all these thing appear him like tremend nightmar he wa oblig make mental effort recal fact that all that surround him wa real mariu had alreadi seen too much life not know that noth is more immin than imposs that what it is alway necessari forese is unforeseen he had look hi own drama as piec which one doe not understand mist which envelop hi thought he did not recogn javert who bound hi post had not so much as move hi head whole attack barricad who had gaze revolt seeth around him resign martyr majesti judg mariu had not even seen him meanwhil assail did not stir they could be heard march swarm end street but they did not ventur it either becaus they were await order or becaus they were await reinforc hurl themselv afresh thi impregn sought dead he wa not there he wa evid prison combeferr said enjolra they have our friend we have their agent are you set death that spi ye repli enjolra but less so than life jean prouvair thi took place tap room near javert s post well resum combeferr i am go fasten my handkerchief my cane go as flag truce offer exchang our man their listen said enjolra lay hi hand combeferr s arm end street appear that there is row cosett had slept onli few hour but soundli she had had sweet dream which possibl aros fact that her littl bed wa veri white some one who wa mariu had appear her light she awok sun her eye which first produc her effect be continu her dream her first thought emerg thi dream wa smile one cosett felt herself thoroughli reassur like jean valjean she had few hour previous pass that reaction soul which absolut will not hear unhappi she began cherish hope all her might know whi then she felt pang her heart it wa three day she had seen mariu but she said herself that he must have receiv her letter that he knew where she wa that he wa so clever that he would find mean reach her that certainli day perhap that veri morn it wa broad daylight but ray light were veri horizont she thought that it wa veri earli but that she must rise nevertheless order receiv mariu she felt that she could not live mariu that consequ that wa suffici that mariu would come no object wa valid all thi wa certain it wa monstrou enough alreadi have suffer three day mariu absent three day thi wa horribl part good god now thi cruel teas high had been gone mariu wa arriv he would bring good news youth is made thu it quickli dri it eye it find sorrow useless doe not accept it youth is smile futur presenc unknown quantiti which is itself it is natur it be happi it seem as though it respir were made hope moreov cosett could not rememb what mariu had said her subject thi absenc which wa last onli one day what explan it he had given her everi one ha notic what nimbl coin which one ha drop ground roll away hide what art it render itself undiscover there are thought which play us same trick they nestl away corner our brain that is end them they are lost it is imposs lay memori them cosett wa somewhat vex useless littl effort made her memori she told herself that it wa veri naughti veri wick her have forgotten word utter mariu she sprang bed accomplish two ablut soul bodi her prayer her toilet one may case exig introduc reader nuptial chamber not virgin chamber vers would hardli ventur it prose must not it is interior flower that is not yet unfold it is white dark it is privat cell close lili which must not be gaze man so long as sun ha not gaze it woman bud is sacr that innoc bud which open that ador half nuditi which is afraid itself that white foot which take refug slipper that throat which veil itself mirror as though mirror were eye that chemis which make hast rise conceal shoulder creak bit furnitur or pass vehicl those cord tie those clasp fasten those lace drawn those tremor those shiver cold modesti that exquisit affright everi movement that almost wing uneasi where there is no caus alarm success phase dress as charm as cloud dawn it is not fit that all thi should be narrat it is too much have even call attent it eye man must be more religi presenc rise young girl than presenc rise star possibl hurt should inspir augment respect down peach bloom plum radiat crystal snow wing butterfli powder feather are coars compar that chastiti which doe not even know that it is chast young girl is onli flash dream is not yet statu her bed chamber is hidden sombr part ideal indiscreet touch glanc brutal thi vagu penumbra here contempl is profan we shall therefor show noth that sweet littl flutter cosett s rise orient tale relat how rose wa made white god but that adam look her when she wa unfold she wa asham turn crimson we are number who fall speechless presenc young girl flower we think them worthi vener cosett dress herself veri hastili comb dress her hair which wa veri simpl matter those day when women did not swell their curl band cushion puff did not put crinolin their lock then she open window cast her eye around her everi direct hope descri some bit street angl hous edg pavement so that she might be abl watch mariu there but no view outsid wa be had back court wa surround toler high wall outlook wa onli sever garden cosett pronounc these garden hideou first time her life she found flower ugli smallest scrap gutter street would have met her wish better she decid gaze sky as though she thought that mariu might come that quarter all onc she burst tear not that thi wa fickl soul but hope cut twain deject that wa her case she had confus conscious someth horribl thought were rife air fact she told herself that she wa not sure anyth that withdraw herself sight wa be lost idea that mariu could return her heaven appear her no longer charm but mourn then as is natur these cloud calm return her hope sort unconsci smile which yet indic trust god everi one hous wa still asleep countri like silenc reign not shutter had been open porter s lodg wa close toussaint had not risen cosett natur thought that her father wa asleep she must have suffer much she must have still been suffer greatli she said herself that her father had been unkind but she count mariu eclips such light wa decidedli imposs now then she heard sharp shock distanc she said it is odd that peopl should be open shut their carriag gate so earli they were report cannon batter barricad few feet cosett s window ancient perfectli black cornic wall provenc that abattoir form squar these four way less sagaci man would have remain undecid jean valjean select broadest that is say belt sewer but here question again came should he descend or ascend agent should never lose sight each other so that case one agent should ani caus grow weak hi servic other may supervis him take hi place fourthli it is inexplic whi special regul prison madelonett interdict prison have chair even pay it fifthli madelonett there are onli two bar canteen so that canteen woman can touch prison her hand sixthli prison call barker who summon other prison parlor forc prison pay them two sou call hi name distinctli thi is theft seventhli broken thread ten sou are withheld weav shop thi is abus contractor cloth is none wors it eighthli it is annoy visitor la forc be oblig travers boy court order reach parlor saint mari l égyptienn ninthli it is fact that ani day gendarm can be overheard relat court yard prefectur interrog put magistr prison gendarm who should be sworn secreci repeat what he ha heard examin room is grave disord tenthli mme henri is honest woman her canteen is veri neat but it is bad have woman keep wicket mous trap secret cell thi is unworthi conciergeri great civil javert wrote these line hi calmest most correct chirographi not omit singl comma make paper screech hi pen last line he sign javert inspector 1st class post place du châtelet june 7th 1832 one o clock morn javert dri fresh ink paper fold it like letter seal it wrote back _note administration_ left it tabl quit post glaze grate door fell behind him again he travers place du châtelet diagon regain quay return automat precis veri point which he had abandon quarter hour previous lean hi elbow found himself again same attitud same pave stone parapet he did not appear have stir dark wa complet it wa sepulchr moment which follow midnight ceil cloud conceal star not singl light burn hous citi no one wa pass all street quay which could be seen were desert notr dame tower court hous seem featur night street lantern redden margin quay outlin bridg lay shapeless mist one behind other recent rain had swollen river spot where javert wa lean wa it will be rememb situat precis rapid sein perpendicularli that formid spiral whirlpool which loos knot themselv again like endless screw javert bent hi head gaze all wa black noth wa be distinguish sound foam wa audibl but river could not be seen moment that dizzi depth gleam light appear undul vagu water possess power take light no one know whenc convert it snake light vanish all becam indistinct onc more immens seem thrown open there what lay wa not water it wa gulf wall quay abrupt confus mingl vapor instantli conceal sight produc effect escarp infinit noth wa be seen but hostil chill water stale odor wet stone could be felt fierc breath rose thi abyss flood river divin rather than perceiv tragic whisper wave melancholi vast arch bridg imagin fall that gloomi void all that shadow wa full horror javert remain motionless sever minut gaze thi open shadow he consid invis fixiti that resembl attent water roar all onc he took off hi hat place it edg quay moment later tall black figur which belat passer distanc might have taken phantom appear erect parapet quay bent sein then drew itself again fell straight down shadow dull splash follow shadow alon wa secret convuls that obscur form which had disappear elsewher said look her natur divid live be those who are arriv those who are depart those who are depart are turn shadow those who are arriv light henc gulf which is fatal part old involuntari part young thi breach first insens increas slowli like all separ branch bough becom detach trunk grow away it it is no fault their youth goe where there is joy festiv vivid light love old age goe end they valjean descend hi staircas took three step street seat himself post that same stone post where gavroch had found him medit night 5th 6th june he remain there few moment then went upstair again thi wa last oscil pendulum follow day he did not leav hi apart day that he did not leav hi bed hi portress who prepar hi scanti repast few cabbag or potato bacon glanc brown earthenwar plate exclaim but you ate noth yesterday poor dear man certainli i did repli jean valjean plate is quit full look water jug it is empti that prove that you have drunk it doe not prove that you have eaten well said jean valjean what if i felt hungri onli water that is call thirst when one doe not eat same time it is call fever i will eat morrow or triniti day whi not day is it thing say i will eat morrow idea leav my platter even touch it my ladi finger potato were so good jean valjean took old woman s hand i promis you that i will eat them he said hi benevol voic i am not pleas you repli portress jean valjean saw no other human creatur than thi good woman there are street pari which no one ever pass hous which no one ever come he wa one those street one those hous while he still went he had purchas coppersmith few sou littl copper crucifix which he had hung nail opposit hi bed that gibbet is alway good look week pass jean valjean had not taken step hi room he still remain bed portress said her husband good man upstair yonder doe not get he no longer eat he will not last long that man ha hi sorrow that he ha you won t get it my head that hi daughter ha made bad marriag porter repli tone marit sovereignti if he s rich let him have doctor if he is not rich let him go if he ha no doctor he will die if he ha one he will die said porter portress set scrape away grass what she call her pavement old knife as she tore blade she grumbl it s shame such neat old man he s as white as chicken she caught sight doctor quarter as he pass end street she took it herself request him come upstair it s second floor said she you have onli enter as good man no longer stir hi bed door is alway unlock doctor saw jean valjean spoke him when he came down again portress interrog him well doctor your sick man is veri ill inde what is matter him everyth noth he is man who all appear ha lost some person who is dear him peopl die that what did he say you he told me that he wa good health shall you come again doctor ye repli doctor but some one els besid must come chapter iii pen is heavi man who lift fauchelev s cart one even jean valjean found difficulti rais himself hi elbow he felt hi wrist could not find hi daelli publish italian translat _le misérables_ milan hautevil hous octob 18 1862 you are right sir when you tell me that _le misérables_ is written all nation i do not know it will be read all but i wrote it all it is address england as well as spain itali as well as franc germani as well as ireland republ which have slave as well as empir which have serf social problem overstep frontier sore human race those great sore which cover globe do not halt red or blue line trace map everi place where man is ignor despair everi place where woman is sold bread wherev child suffer lack book which should instruct him hearth which should warm him book _le misérables_ knock door say open me i come you hour civil which we are now pass which is still so sombr _miser s_ name is man he is agon all clime he is groan all languag your itali is no more exempt evil than is our franc your admir itali ha all miseri face it doe not bandit that rage form pauper inhabit your mountain few nation are more deepli eaten that ulcer convent which i have endeavor fathom spite your possess rome milan napl palermo turin florenc sienna pisa mantua bologna ferrara genoa venic heroic histori sublim ruin magnific ruin superb citi you are like ourselv poor you are cover marvel vermin assuredli sun itali is splendid but ala azur sky doe not prevent rag man like us you have prejudic superstit tyranni fanatic blind law lend assist ignor custom you tast noth present nor futur flavor past be mingl it you have barbarian monk savag lazzaron social question is same you as us there are few less death hunger you few more fever your social hygien is not much better than our shadow which are protest england are cathol itali but differ name _vescovo_ is ident _bishop_ it alway mean night pretti nearli same qualiti explain bibl badli amount same thing as understand gospel badli is it necessari emphas thi must thi melancholi parallel be yet more complet verifi have you not indig person glanc have you not parasit glanc doe not that hideou balanc whose two scale pauper parasit so mourn preserv their mutual equilibrium oscil you as it doe us where is your armi schoolmast onli armi which civil acknowledg where are your free compulsori school doe everi one know how read land dant michael angelo have you made public school your barrack have you not like ourselv opul war budget paltri budget educ have not you also that passiv obedi which is so easili convert soldierli obedi militari establish which push regul extrem fire garibaldi that is say live honor itali let us subject your social order examin let us take it where it stand as it stand let us view it flagrant offenc show me woman child it is amount protect which these two feebl creatur are surround that degre civil is be measur is prostitut less heartrend napl than pari what is amount truth that spring your law what amount justic spring your tribun do you chanc be so fortun as be ignor mean those gloomi word public prosecut legal infami prison scaffold execution death penalti italian you as us beccaria is dead farinac is aliv then let us scrutin your state reason have you govern which comprehend ident moral polit you have reach point where you grant amnesti hero someth veri similar ha been done franc stay let us pass miseri review let each one contribut hi pile you are as rich as we have you not like ourselv two condemn religi condemn pronounc priest social condemn decre judg oh great nation itali thou resemblest great nation franc ala our brother you are like ourselv _miserables_ depth gloom wherein you dwell you do not see much more distinctli than we radiant distant portal eden onli priest are mistaken these holi portal are not behind us i resum thi book _le misérables_ is no less your mirror than our certain men certain cast rise revolt against thi book i understand that mirror those reveal truth are hate that doe not prevent them be use as myself i have written all profound love my own countri but be engross franc more than ani other nation proport as i advanc life i grow more simpl i becom more more patriot human thi is moreov tendenc our age law radianc french revolut book must ceas be exclus french italian german spanish or english becom european i say more human if they are correspond enlarg civil henc new logic art certain requir composit which modifi everyth even condit formerli narrow tast languag which must grow broader like all rest franc certain critic have reproach me my great delight have transgress bound what they call french tast i should be glad if thi eulogium were merit short i am do what i can i suffer same univers suffer i tri assuag it i possess onli puni forc man i cri all help me thi sir is what your letter prompt me say i say it you your countri if i have insist so strongli it is becaus one phrase your letter you write there are italian they are numer who say thi book _le misérables_ is french book it doe not concern us let french read it as histori we read it as romanc ala i repeat we be italian or frenchmen miseri concern us all ever histori ha been written ever philosophi ha medit miseri ha been garment human race moment ha length arriv tear off that rag replac nake limb man peopl sinist fragment past grand purpl robe dawn if thi letter seem you servic enlighten some mind dissip some prejudic you are liberti publish it sir accept i pray you renew
